games.name: Motoride Rollercoaster VR
games.short_description: Motoride will take you to a journey full of joy and danger. Admire beautiful view from top of the mountains, go deep into dark caves and discover ancient forgotten ruins. An extremely exciting ride on a cross bike in virtual reality can make you dizzy.

games.name: Glory's Fools
games.short_description: A retro RPG set in the mythic Age of Greece. Find allies, choose your path to glory, fighting monsters, men, or even Gods and become a true hero!

games.name: Animal Rescue
games.short_description: Animal Rescue is a unique game in which you play the role of a field rescuer-vet. Face the elements of nature and save innocent animals! Their life depends entirely on you! Someone has to save them! Will it be you?

games.name: Bubble Blast Rescue VR
games.short_description: Help save the Bubble Blast from horrible enemies who are keeping them hostage on remote islands !

games.name: Stray Souls
games.short_description: Enter a world of nightmares in this third person, action-horror, inspired by the classics of the genre. Fight terrifying creatures, solve mind-bending puzzles, and unravel a horrid family secret to expose the chilling truth behind your existence.

games.name: McPixel
games.short_description: McPixel is a save-the-day guy that you guide through 100 short challenges to prevent stuff from blowing up. You have only 20 seconds to save the day! Think quick!

games.name: Salt Aquarium Fish Simulator
games.short_description: Feed your fish, sell them, buy better and more special fish, and compete with your friends. Be the best and become the star of the industry. You can also engage in trading with your friends. Remember, 2 fish are better than one.

games.name: Nubarron: The adventure of an unlucky gnome
games.short_description: Guide Gnome across the dangers of this twisted fairytale world. Can you make the annoying cloud go away? And recover his stolen Lucky Hat? Trust your friends? Find out in this, a casual platformer set in a beautiful painted world full of weird creatures you'll have to deal with.

games.name: Hamilton's Great Adventure
games.short_description: All new DLC, Retro Fever, Now Available!

games.name: Judgement
games.short_description: Your life, your choices-now face the Judgement. What happens when the story of your life is laid bare? Judgement a narrative-driven visual novel, you find yourself in the afterlife, where your every action, decision, and intention is weighed. Life is over. But your story isn’t. Judgement awaits.

games.name: PULMO
games.short_description: PULMO is a casual puzzle game where you control a lone character in a world full of faceless crowds.

games.name: Bacon Man: An Adventure
games.short_description: Bacon Man! Your claim to the throne is in jeopardy! Expert platforming skills and sheer arrogance are essential for your adventure. Prove your innocence by destroying all who oppose you.

games.name: The Way of the Pixelated Fist
games.short_description: The Way of the Pixelated Fist is a parkour and martial arts inspired free-roaming cinematic platformer. While it blends together the gameplay concepts of The Prince of Persia and Karateka, they are presented with refined controls and other modern innovations to give the game an intuitive and fluid feel.

games.name: Retro Game Crunch
games.short_description: Retro Game Crunch is a series of 7 games, full of the charm and challenge of the 8-bit generation. Each world feels like an authentic NES classic. A massive genre-spanning collection.

games.name: Automation Station
games.short_description: Explore a mysterious planet, harvest and refine resources, discover new technology, craft machines, and set up automated factories.

games.name: Conrad Stevenson's Paranormal P.I.
games.short_description: I made this first-person single player ghost hunting simulation game, trying to take an authentic approach at investigating ghosts. Use essential paranormal tools to help your community alleviate their concerns and put their minds at ease.

games.name: ARK: The Survival Of The Fittest
games.short_description: ARK: The Survival of the Fittest is a prototype spin-off of ARK: Survival Evolved, pitting up to 60 combatants against each other in a fast-paced, action-packed struggle for survival, where players are ultimately pushed into an epic final showdown leading their Dinosaur Armies into battle.

games.name: Dice Showdown
games.short_description: Round-based games and Roguelike games are seamlessly integrated, offering a gaming experience where luck and strategy coexist! In your adventure, create a unique skill set, confront various enemies, discover powerful devices, and this world awaits your salvation!

games.name: Space IXI Frontier Wars
games.short_description: Sci-Fi casual adventure single-player third-person shooter with fluid movement and little military strategy. Spaceship private company SPACE IXI collects corpses that the EREV RAV had hidden in order to use them to create hellish portals in heaven and earth.

games.name: Ellen and the Degenerates RPG
games.short_description: A wonderfully ramshackle game about a rock and roll band and their stolen equipment.

games.name: Undoing Evil
games.short_description: Undoing Evil is a role-playing adventure game in a fantasy world with turn-based combat. Explore the world to discover its beauty, the people, and uncover the filth and the plots that lurk beneath the surface. Your very life is being threatened. Hire a group of adventurers and solve the conundrum.

games.name: Polyfocus
games.short_description: A gamified productivity app to help you manage time while you work.

games.name: Skeletal Avenger
games.short_description: Embark on a bone-chilling quest for vengeance as a skull-hurling skeletal warrior in Skeletal Avenger! This captivating roguelite dungeon crawler melds hack'n'slash mayhem with endlessly replayable gameplay, offering a thrilling, ever-evolving experience that keeps you coming back for more.

games.name: ProtectSeaWar
games.short_description: RTS instant entry level naval warfare games

games.name: みんなで人間メダルゲーム
games.short_description: Hurl the “Warumon” sinners, flood the tray, and grab the jackpot! A 4‑player online ragdoll‑physics medal game where you vote their crimes and fill your Warumon bestiary.

games.name: Barro
games.short_description: Choose your little car and race!

games.name: Godstone Tactics
games.short_description: Godstone Tactics is a tactical turn-based strategy game featuring competitive battles. Assemble your team of distinctive animal units. Master the unique challenges of each isometric arena with your tactics. Outsmart opponents to defeat the enemy king and claim victory in the world of Sangreal!

games.name: My Life as a Robot Vacuum
games.short_description: Assume the role of a Robot vacuum and roll around cleaning up messes in this short 3rd person adventure!

games.name: Hubert's Island Adventure: Mouse o' War
games.short_description: Zip and zap your way to victory!

games.name: Hentai Tales: Succubus Utopia
games.short_description: Legend has it that succubi exist somewhere beyond the realm of sleep. They sneak into the dreams of young men after midnight and have their way with them to obtain their erotic energy. You are about to have an unforgettable series of encounters with these succubi! What fate will befall you?

games.name: Puzzle Nebula
games.short_description: Puzzle Nebula is a mind-bending puzzle game set in the far corners of space.

games.name: RIP THROUGH TIME
games.short_description: Aliens have crash-landed on Earth! Using their advanced technology, they warp through time and begin to seize the planet era by era… Now you, a highly skilled assassin, have to RIP THROUGH TIME to put an end to their schemes!

games.name: The Accuser and The Abyss
games.short_description: You are a detective. You have been assigned a partner to investigate a horrid case. But things are not what it seems.  Navigate the paths as you attempt to unravel the truth behind your lost memories and your new disturbing detective partner.

games.name: AdVenture Communist
games.short_description: The world's greatest communism simulator!

games.name: No Turning Back: The Pixel Art Action-Adventure Roguelike
games.short_description: No Turning Back is an indie pixel art randomly generated action rogue-like developed by a new indie developer with tons of player classes, spells, weapons, armour and unlocks!

games.name: Shmup Arena
games.short_description: Take on intense challenges and waves of enemies in this frenetic arena shooter that demands quick reflexes and nonstop action. Survive the onslaught and defeat powerful bosses while staying in motion, mastering arenas designed for those who crave adrenaline and intense combat.

games.name: Lawnmower Game 2: Drifter
games.short_description: Sequel to Lawnmower Game. Drive with more faster lawnmowers and game contains 3 gamemodes

games.name: Reality Falls
games.short_description: In a dusty, dilapidated town on the former Soviet steppe, a young traveller finds himself embroiled in a strange and surreal plot that threatens the very existence of Reality Falls itself. A story-driven indie adventure, with classic point-and-click puzzles and a retro JRPG-style look and feel.

games.name: THREAT -SCREAM AND ESCAPE-
games.short_description: THREAT -SCREAM AND ESCAPE- is a unique horror game where you must scream into your microphone to stun approaching creatures and make your escape. Use the power of your voice to clear the path and guide the protagonist, who wakes up in a mysterious research facility, to freedom.

games.name: Skeleton vs zombies
games.short_description: Your a skeleton and you shoot zombies

games.name: Six F and Six 0
games.short_description: A 2D action game that explores and adventures in the black and white world The hero is somewhere in this world full of strange creatures Aim to destroy jewels and obtain archives.

games.name: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike
games.short_description: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike is a mostly classic RPG/Roguelike with a vast game world. The game has dozens of dungeons and items, and hundreds of unique enemies. There is a great variety in magic, curses and item enchantments.

games.name: This War of Mine
games.short_description: In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle.

games.name: Volatica: The Devil's Trap
games.short_description: Volatica: The Devil's Trap is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with grim hand-drawn illustrations, dark humor and a branching story. Take on the role of a witch who got trapped by her desires after making a deal with the devil.

games.name: Awakened Evil
games.short_description: Awakened Evil is an action platformer inspired by the classics. Jump and slash your way through intense linear stages that will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to slay all the bosses, and take on evil itself?

games.name: BURNT ASHES
games.short_description: Burning Ashes is a 3D first-person game in the search and horror genre. You are a prisoner trying to escape from prison after you have fallen into a coma, Your job in the prison is to find a tool to open the prison door and then escape from the island After escaping from the island by boat ...

games.name: Prison Life Simulator: The Legend of Navalny
games.short_description: Immerse yourself in the prison life of the most dangerous criminal in modern Russia.Go through the prison path from the beginning and determine the fate of the famous defendant. What will you become? Offended, authority or maybe the president of the Russian Federation? Everything depends on you!

games.name: Toribash Next
games.short_description: Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, the award-winning turn-based sandbox fighting game, developed by Nabi Studios. More players and fighting, weapons and blood, and ultimately - more fun.

games.name: Parkour with Friends
games.short_description: Kekdot Center is a fun and challenging multiplayer obstacle/parkour game in which players will have to find their way to the finish. Players can take a short break in the Plaza where they can socialize with others in the form of text chat and voice chat.

games.name: AdventureQuest 3D
games.short_description: The Void King is raising an army in secret. Death has chosen you as his champion to bring him down. Adventure & quest alongside your friends in this bizarre cross-platform MMORPG from the creators of the original, and comically-redundantly named... AdventureQuest! Weekly releases!

games.name: Master of Shotgun Camper
games.short_description: Hey Corner Campers! "Master of Shotgun Camper" is designed for you to perfect the art of corner camping and pre-aiming.

games.name: The USB Stick Found in the Grass
games.short_description: A forensic challenge – find out who the owner of the USB stick was and reconstruct their story.

games.name: SLIDE: platformer
games.short_description: SLIDE: platformer is a hardcore game with an unorthodox control scheme. It will make you think. It might make you cry. It will test your platforming skills to the limit!

games.name: Wwbit
games.short_description: "1bit Pzzle" is a puzzle game

games.name: VirtualSociety
games.short_description: VirtualSociety is a multiplayer sandbox game where you can create anything, from your own cozy little room to an entire universe. Create unique characters and let them live unforgettable experiences. Everything made in a really cute hand-painted art-style.

games.name: The Aquatic Adventure of the Last Human
games.short_description: Explore the ruins of the human race and discover the thriving wildlife that blossomed after our extinction in this underwater action/adventure. Encounter monstrous creatures and let curiosity guide you through an inevitable voyage of extinction.

games.name: Vestige Memoria
games.short_description: Vestige Memoria is an episodic horror game, in which we take paranormal stories, and turn them into horror experiences. In these thrilling horror experiences, take control of the survivors of these memories, living through these experiences as described by the person.

games.name: THOSE DAMN ALIENS! VR
games.short_description: Aliens have boarded your ship; It's time to take arms and defend yourself from the incoming hive. 'Those Damn Aliens' is a VR wave based first person shooter with campaign and survival modes.

games.name: Smash Pixel Racing
games.short_description: Smash Pixel Racing is a 2-4 player local multiplayer game about spaceship racing and smashing your friends into asteroids. Drift and dodge around space junk, take out enemies, collect energy, and pick your moment to boost, shoot or smash your way to victory!

games.name: Adventures of Bertram Fiddle 2: A Bleaker Predicklement
games.short_description: A Bleaker Predicklement is a hilarious AND mysterious point and click adventure game. Explore smoggy alleys, meet suspicious characters and help Bertram as he finds himself framed for a murdering he did not commit!

games.name: Oddment
games.short_description: Oddment is a roguelite focused on mining and exploration, set on a moon orbiting a distant earth-like planet nestled within a dangerous corner of space.

games.name: Flob and the Shattered Dimension
games.short_description: After an experiment went wrong, a lab assistant embarks on an adventure to rescue his creator, the great scientist Dr. Franz, who is now trapped in another dimension. Join Flob on this journey, explore hostile environments, and rescue Dr. Franz.

games.name: Viva Zalata
games.short_description: Viva Zalata is a famous Egyptian hero movie. Today we take a look of the most beautiful video game ever. funny and comedy game with action adventure. The game in early access so you receive recently updates. Purchase it now!.

games.name: 8-Bit Adventures 1: The Forgotten Journey Remastered Edition
games.short_description: 8-Bit Adventures: The Forgotten Journey Remastered Edition is a retro-styled JRPG with polish and personality, that focuses less on references and more on telling a story...

games.name: The League of the Hustlers
games.short_description: Join the league of hustlers, a secret organization of revolutionaries, cheating card players, swordsmen and detectives. A game that mixes classic adventure games with card tricks, duels and investigation in a plot to uncover the truth.

games.name: Nebula Nuker
games.short_description: Command a powerful craft in order to lead a fleet to victory! Purchase upgrades to improve your ship, collect powerups, and destroy increasingly powerful foes!

games.name: Colony Survival
games.short_description: Colony Survival is a unique first-person strategy game developed by a two-man team. Build your own colony in a voxel world. Command guards, farmers, miners and other colonists. Defend your colony against the horde of monsters that attacks every night!

games.name: Super Panda Adventures
games.short_description: In Super Panda Adventures, you play as the brave panda-knight Fu, who is about to finish his training to become the new guardian of the Princess. At the same day of the big celebration party, some uninvited Robots show up to conquer the planet and take the Princess away in their Space Ships!

games.name: Traveler's Game
games.short_description: Your name is Camus Chen. Because of a recommendation from your friend Lu, you downloaded a battle simulator game famous for its sociability. You meet strangers and learn about their lives by simply chatting with them online. Unexpectedly, you will reveal a big secret of yourself...

games.name: Music Band Manager
games.short_description: Always dreamed of creating your own music band? We will realize your dream! Record songs, release albums and manage group activities! With the advancement of the group, managers will help you, and you will also have to face more than one difficult choice. Compete for a place in the top 100! Conquer the whole world!

games.name: DevilShaft: TheTower
games.short_description: DevilShaft: TheTower tells the story of the heroes who tried to fight evil from the very beginning of time. After the invasion of demonic forces on the ground, the heroes tried in every way to expel them from their land.

games.name: Non-Euclidean Minesweeper
games.short_description: Non-Euclidean Minesweeper is a mine-sweeping game played in hyperbolic and Euclidean spaces. All the problems are absolutely solvable by logic alone. Windows PCs, Linux PCs, gaming handhelds and Steam Deck are supported.

games.name: DEEP HOLE
games.short_description: "What kind of world is extending beyond that hole?" A 3D exploration Jetpack Akushi game that points to the lowest layer of a vertical hole cave that can not be seen at the bottom, depending on the situation.

games.name: Primal Carnage: Extinction
games.short_description: Hunt humans, slay dinosaurs. It's chaotic prehistoric PvP, pick a side. Think fast, or you're extinct!

games.name: Bloodlines of Prima
games.short_description: -Servers are going offline 12/29/20 for good! Thanks for your support!

games.name: Danger Zombies
games.short_description: Danger zombies is a game with plenty of suspense and plenty of action, where the character will have many challenges to complete the objective of surviving, we've already started armed and ready for battle, we'll have a long-range rifle, a short-range pistol and an ax for hand-to-hand combat.

games.name: The Sacred Stone
games.short_description: The Sacred Stone has been stolen. Your parents have been killed. Learn the truth about yourself. Wield Magic, Wield a sword, Fight countless Enemies, Monsters Boss fights, explore open worlds, side quests and more. Enemy Combat is fast paced.

games.name: Keep and Dash Horror
games.short_description: While running away from multiple enemies, carry various items such as wardrobes, chairs and tables to their destinations. Buy items that increase your strength, movement speed, etc., and run away from enhanced enemies. The player's goal is to reach higher level stages.

games.name: Tick: The Time Based Puzzle Game
games.short_description: Test your timing and your patience in this unique casual puzzle game. Set over the backdrop of retro minimalist art style you can choose from 3 different game modes. Play your way through 50 stages of increasing difficult puzzles in Stage Mode. See how fast you really are in Speed Mode.

games.name: The Forgotten Forest
games.short_description: The Forgotten Forest is about a young girl who is lost in a cursed forest. Discover the hidden secrets behind this mysterious forest, and find a way to escape. But most of all, don't forget The Forgotten Forest.

games.name: Eden Falling
games.short_description: Eden Falling is a new kind of multiplayer, sci-fi, turn-based, strategic survival RPG. As a chosen survivor you travel the wastelands, craft, take on contracts, hunt feral mutants, and navigate the merciless politics of a savage new Earth. Make your mark on the world and create your legend!

games.name: Secret of the Rendrasha Blade CH1&2
games.short_description: A classic JRPG at heart, but with modern game design elements baked in, with a ton of secrets, hidden humor, easter eggs, and questionable / offensive choices to be made.

games.name: Dr Muddles and the Cursed Library
games.short_description: Play as the talented but confused sorcerer, Dr Muddles, who wakes up in a strange library full of dangerous magic. Explore the library and try to unravel the mystery of how you got here, and more importantly, how to get out!

games.name: Resilience Wave Survival
games.short_description: Resilience: Wave Survival is a physics based endless wave survival shooter. Explore to Search for Weapons and Ammo to help Defeat the Enemies, better find food and water too if you want to Survive for longer, but Beware of the Tripods stalking the lands.

games.name: Find Objects
games.short_description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Find Objects, Your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games, in which you have to find the objects while the clock is ticking.

games.name: King Kaiju
games.short_description: Live the Dream! Be the Monster! Smash your way through a completely destructible virtual reality city. A simple and silly sandbox game for your inner Kaiju. RRRRRAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRR

games.name: The Rainy Port Keelung 雨港基隆
games.short_description: The story will develop into the year of 1947, where the players would face one of the most traumatic historical events in the history of Taiwan.Sorry,now there are only English interface, English subtitles are still being processed,we hope to complete as soon as possible.

games.name: Puzzle Party
games.short_description: Puzzle Party is a simple, damaged pixel style block pushing puzzle game with a few twists! Jump into the perpetual void as you immerse yourself in the odd tale of Amid, his old partner, and the strange phenomena that surrounds their abandoned passion project.

games.name: WonderCat Adventures
games.short_description: WonderCat is a thrilling one finger runner-platformer with a twist of reflexion. Help the WonderCat come back home through 5 worlds, 50 hand-made levels and 5 giant bosses. Collect the glowing stones to unlock 5 secret levels and extra achievements.

games.name: The Lilliputian Runner
games.short_description: Skill-based platformer where color matters!

games.name: HeartZ: Co-Hope Puzzles
games.short_description: HeartZ offers you a hearty combination of platform, action, puzzle and local co-op gaming. Outsmart traps and solve mysteries in each room and level while getting rid of Dr. Nylus' soldiers and machines! Kick, jump, fart, scare, bite... your way through mischievously designed levels!

games.name: Again
games.short_description: Simple 3D platform jumping action game with beautiful audio tracks.

games.name: Ephemerid: A Musical Adventure
games.short_description: Ephemerid is a rock fairy tale about a paper mayfly. Part rhythm game, part point-and-click adventure, and part rock opera.

games.name: Pixel: ru²
games.short_description: Play as a pixel adventuring through image files in a digital world where physics aren't constant. Run, jump, flip upside down, and rotate your gravity. Use weapons to destroy other pixels before they destroy you. Collect bits of data from challenging locations to find out why your world must survive at all costs.

games.name: Mini Rollers
games.short_description: Mini Rollers is a rolling-ball platformer game, where players must race against the clock to get their balls to the goal. Roll, jump, and swing through a variety of obstacles, enemies, and challenges with 18 unique balls.

games.name: ScooterFlow
games.short_description: The world’s most realistic freestyle scooter game is finally here. Ride the skatepark, hit the streets, boost the mega ramp, fully customize your scooter & throw down all of the real life trick combinations you could dream of within this physics based scooter game.

games.name: Captain MAYO
games.short_description: You play a jar of MAYO. Your goal is to free the princess and defeat the evil Johnny Mustard.

games.name: Re;Lord 1 ~The witch of Herfort and stuffed animals~
games.short_description: Take command of the demon, Wilfried and liberate Groessen from the control of the Witches of Ruin in this strip battle RPG! Retake territory, gather allies and use the art of sorcery to battle and strip the witches' of their clothing in the name of Saarland!

games.name: The Adventure Pals
games.short_description: The Adventure Pals is an epic adventure platformer fueled by imagination, friendship, and the dark side of hot dogs. Your dad has been dadnapped and you, your pet rock, and a tongue-helicoptering giraffe must fight your way through levels filled with platforming, bizarre enemies, and big bosses to save the world!

games.name: Dull Grey
games.short_description: Dull Grey is an award-winning visual novel about growing up. Experience an emotional story of a mother and son in a dystopian world, make simple but meaningful choices and discover multiple endings. Will you see your story unfold in full colour?

games.name: Activate: 激活
games.short_description: Use items and your wisdom to activate the block maze!

games.name: Cub Gym
games.short_description: A challenging and fun crazy scavenger hunt game.

games.name: TORMENTOR
games.short_description: Take on the role of a merciless torturer. Earn money from video transmissions of your torments and then buy new victims and torture tools to expand your prison.

games.name: Power Network Tycoon
games.short_description: Power Network Tycoon is a power grid simulation and strategy game where you build and maintain high-voltage power networks. Construct infrastructure, monitor resources, research upgrades, adapt to environmental challenges, keep up with energy demands and protect your island community!

games.name: Knight Adventure
games.short_description: Help the Valiant Knight to save a beautiful Princess.

games.name: Containment: The Zombie Puzzler
games.short_description: Use your wits, weapons, and the city itself to save Franklin from the zombie apocalypse in this exciting indie action puzzler.

games.name: Universe Sandbox
games.short_description: Create & destroy on an unimaginable scale with a realistic physics-based space simulator. Explore the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet. Use science to bend the laws of gravity, collide planets, boil away oceans, fire epic space lasers, and customize your universe.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzles
games.short_description: The Number 1 Jigsaw Puzzle Game.

games.name: aMAZE Classic: Inverted
games.short_description: aMAZE Classic: Inverted is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with abstraction art and calm soundtrack.

games.name: Homeseek
games.short_description: Homeseek is a post-apocalyptic survival strategy game set on a resource-strapped Earth at the turn of the next century. In a dried-up wasteland where water has become the new gold, every choice you make becomes life or death.

games.name: Woodle Tree Adventures
games.short_description: Woodle Tree Adventures is an old school platform game with a catchy and unique art style! Explore a total of 6 worlds and save the lands with the magical water drops you'll find through your journey, bringing back peace and balance and finally becoming the new hero!

games.name: Adventures of Pip
games.short_description: Play as the ultimate digital underdog in the Adventures of Pip,an action-platformer with a fresh gameplay twist inside a retro 32-bit world. Alas, Pip is an unlikely 1-pixel hero yet has the unique ability to absorb the pixels of his defeated enemies to evolve into three different forms.

games.name: Rocket League®
games.short_description: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Rocket League includes casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Season Mode, special “Mutators” that let you change the rules entirely, hockey and...

games.name: Santa's Spot It
games.short_description: Embrace Christmas villages. Your mission? To spot the differences between two seemingly identical scenes to progress.

games.name: Cash Crop
games.short_description: The Delightfully Fun Cannabis Farming Game! Stake your claim in the lush Pacific Northwest as you and your quirky crew grow wicked buds, master the art and science of cannabis cultivation, breed new custom strains, expand to new markets, and flirt with law enforcement.

games.name: Death by Deduction
games.short_description: Death by Deduction is a unique blend of logic puzzle and classic murder mystery set in an old English manor during the 1970s. Explore the manor, examine evidence, and question suspects to deduce who the murderer is in "Death by Deduction".

games.name: Rexodus: A VR Story Experience
games.short_description: Rexodus: A VR Story Experience is based on the Dark Horse Graphic Novel Rexodus. This is a VR narrative experience set in a universe where dinosaurs didn't go extinct, they left Earth. Those dinosaurs, utilizing their own advanced technology, are traversing the galaxy.

games.name: An Oath to the Stars
games.short_description: Left for dead by her closest friend and comrade, Hoshiko is now looking for revenge. Follow her in this modern hardcore danmaku SHMUP about revenge, friendship and honour.

games.name: Wrath Of The Violent Vicar - Interactive Film
games.short_description: An Interactive FMV game inspired by Horror / Exploitation movies of the 70s & 80s Violent Vicar puts you the player in control of the movie giving a choice on how the story plays out with multiple options for each scene.

games.name: Dead Pixels
games.short_description: A toxic waste spill finds its way into the water supply, causing the recently deceased to rise from their graves. Now it's up to you to blast your way through the hordes of undead if you're going to escape the city. On the way to your rescue, you'll search stores and houses for supplies, and trade with other survivors.

games.name: The Mighty Quest
games.short_description: When evil is growing, it’s time to stand your ground and do your Mighty Quest. Fight your way through the hordes of enemies and tricky bosses in the 2D RPG with the elements of platformer

games.name: Antares
games.short_description: Grab your gun and blast your way through the infested horde as you try to save humanity from the ultimate doom! Gather resources, upgrade your weapon and explore the story of why you are the only one left alive. Or are you?

games.name: The Misadventures of P.B. Winterbottom
games.short_description: Enter a macabre and comical silent world filled with mischief, time travel and delicious pie. Includes Steam Achievements, Cloud, and Leaderboards!

games.name: Leona's Tricky Adventures
games.short_description: Accompany Leona in a clever puzzle adventure to save the inhabitants of a strange but lovely world. Featuring fresh puzzle mechanics, wonderful retro graphics, lots of exploration and an excellent soundtrack by legendary game composer Chris Huelsbeck.

games.name: The Lord of the Parties
games.short_description: The lord of the parties is a brand new game that combines an RPG with a party shoot 'em up. Explore this unique fantasy world with your own allies!

games.name: Adventure in the Tower of Flight
games.short_description: Adventure in the Tower of Flight is a retro-styled platformer in which you fly instead of jump! You are Wing, a young adventurer. Wing must climb a seeming endless the tower and collect all five known relics held within to become the ruler of the known world.

games.name: Adios
games.short_description: A pig farmer decides he no longer wants to dispose of bodies for the mob. What follows is a discussion between him and his would-be killer.

games.name: Scrap Attack VR
games.short_description: Enter the mysterious caves of Botanika, where the Boltheads are hell-bent on the destruction of the ancient Botanite Crystals. Your mission: Defend them at all costs, against unrelenting waves of frenzied robots. How far can you push yourself to protect the crystal from the robot onslaught?

games.name: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure
games.short_description: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure is a fast-paced 2d shooting game with a random story. You control a group of three migrants traveling west along a wagon trail. The game consists of short scenes that are sequenced together in a semi-random way to tell a crazy adventure story.

games.name: Acro Storm
games.short_description: Prepare to undertake a journey that's a bit more than it seems in the futuristic, interstellar world of competitive airbike racing! As you scream around tracks and dodge dangerous weaponry, always remember; in a competitor's life, there's always more than a prize at stake...

games.name: Look Locked
games.short_description: "Look Locked": A co-op puzzle game where doors only open, if you can see them being opened. Work together, time your actions, and communicate to unravel challenges. Coordination and observation lead to victory!

games.name: Vanquish: The Adventures of Lady Exton
games.short_description: Vanquish: The Adventures of Lady Exton is a 2D platformer set in a quirky steampunk inspired world. Steamscience has altered things in recent times. It’s now become a fight for survival. Kidnapped, escaped and armed with only a parasol, Lady Exton must bring back peace to the human strongholds!

games.name: Ancestory
games.short_description: Turn-based strategy meets card game! Outwit your opponent on multiple different battlefields with cunning strategies. Build your own decks made of underworldly minions and powerful spells!

games.name: Super Puzzle Platformer Deluxe
games.short_description: The title says it all. Take one part falling block puzzle game, combine one part old-school platformer, add a couple thousand pixels, blend and serve. Why match colored blocks when you can just shoot the hell out of them? Your goal is to survive as long as you can. From celebrated indie developer Andrew Morrish and Adult Swim Games.

games.name: Puzzle Ball
games.short_description: Puzzle Ball is a physics-based puzzle game with a flexible and user-friendly level editor.

games.name: Triplicata
games.short_description: Triplicata is a new game that takes place in the not-so-distant future, after Gelatin Monsters came to life from radiation, and took over the world! Test your skills in battle against hundreds of monsters simultaneously in this epic gladiator style game!

games.name: Dungeon Core
games.short_description: Dungeon Core is a roguelite top-down shooter where you get to explore the sewers and beyond to ultimately reach an old underground research facility. Old nuclear waste has caused dangerous mutations in creatures due to a failed experiment. You set out to destroy the abandoned nuclear core.

games.name: Alpha Polaris : A Horror Adventure Game
games.short_description: Alpha Polaris is an oldschool adventure game focusing on slow-burning character driven horror and environmental themes. It draws inspiration from such sources as Inuit legends and Cthulhu mythos.

games.name: The Average Everyday Adventures of Samantha Browne
games.short_description: An interactive story about a painfully introverted college student who must find a way to make some oatmeal in the communal kitchen of her dorm. One simple task, can you help her complete it?

games.name: BattleBlock Theater®
games.short_description: Welcome to BattleBlock Theater! You’ve got no where to go but up...on stage. Play single player or co-op to free your friends and save Hatty Hattington! Jump, solve and battle your way through a mysterious theater inhabited by highly technological felines.

games.name: Adventure Apes and the Mayan Mystery
games.short_description: Go Ape-bit with this fast-paced retro platformer, in which you work to recover a stolen magical artifact in the labyrinth of an ancient temple!

games.name: History in Letters - The Eternal Alchemist
games.short_description: Follow the trail of famous Nicolas Flamel - Use your wits and solve the riddle of the lost diary!

games.name: TailScape: The corgi’s Advendture
games.short_description: Tailscape is a Metroidvania game starring a cute puppy. Solve hidden puzzles and sometimes face large enemies to fill in the story of the bond between humans and animals.

games.name: Abyss Eschaton Survivors
games.short_description: Conquer layered dreams, battle the Abyssal Lord's minions, gather Dream Essence! In this roguelike action game, forge heroes in the Dream Sanctuary by collecting gear, upgrading skills, confronting the Abyssal Lord. "Even fate won't deter you, My Lord? Break the cursed cycle. I'll light your path.”

games.name: Smol Gods
games.short_description: Build a team of tiny gods and maximize their interactions and synergies to outwit your opponent and achieve the highest possible score.

games.name: 渔舟录
games.short_description: 《渔家录》是一个模拟经营结合了轻度求生的游戏，玩家模拟角色渔娘或者渔郎，接取小镇中客人的订单，并驾驶自己的小舟运送到其他水乡城镇。游戏采用水墨以及国风工笔画的融合画风，给玩家展现了一个静谧美好的水乡世界。

games.name: Axel & Pixel
games.short_description: Axel and Pixel are trapped in a beautiful but dangerous dream world. If they plan to get out they must solve its mysteries. Drawn by hand and rendered in full high-definition, Axel & Pixel is a unique journey through an artist's dream.

games.name: PlanetSprite
games.short_description: PlanetSprite is an online MMO where you create your own character, customize, interact, trade and play with other fellow players!

games.name: Story of a Cube
games.short_description: Story of a Cube is an action packed shooter about a lone cube and his quest for revenge. Mixing elements of twin-stick shooters and bullet hell games, this is a hardcode arcade game with a crazy amount of explosions.

games.name: Bullet Chase
games.short_description: You must rescue a body from an invading virus by assisting the immune defense system. An action survival puzzle game, you go from room to room eradicating enemies who relentlessly chase you down by leading them onto bullets being fired from openings on the walls.

games.name: My Stranger Family
games.short_description: Secretly live in a stranger's house. Find food, get some sleep, and take care of your basic needs. Stay healthy while observing your new family. Watch how they live their lives. Sneak around, survive... DON’T GET CAUGHT AND DON’T DIE!

games.name: SURVIVAL: Postapocalypse Now
games.short_description: Want to survive? - Arm yourself and survive. Crafting, shooting, transport and much more awaits you in the Survival game. What happened to the world around and why he died - you may find out. But is this the main question now?

games.name: Sentinel
games.short_description: Sentinel is an interactive audio tower defense game. It mixes strategic gameplay with a dynamic music system.

games.name: Magic Box
games.short_description: Magic Box - interesting puzzle game with a lot of interesting and challenging levels.

games.name: Welcome to Kowloon
games.short_description: This is an indie horror from the first person, in which you find yourself in an area called Kowloon in search of cheap housing. The inhabitants of this place only at first glance seem to be ordinary people, but if we dig deeper, we will see their real faces.

games.name: Hiragana Pixel Party
games.short_description: A chiptune rhythm-action game that also teaches you something! Learn to read Japanese Hiragana and Katakana characters in a fun chiptune adventure! Not just for people who want to learn Japanese, this is a game anyone can enjoy.

games.name: Isaac the Adventurer
games.short_description: Embark on a dangerous journey in the role of a small boy who is chasing his dream of becoming a great adventurer.

games.name: Deeper Still
games.short_description: An immersive sim set in an absurdly dystopian and nihilistic world. Eliminate your targets in fast-paced, ultra-violent fashion. Talk to lunatics, and explore surreal environments with psychedelic visuals and mind-bending soundscapes.

games.name: Search of Galaxy
games.short_description: After the supernova explosion, the Thermian race was destroyed. All knowledge, technologies and data about the past were lost. You must to restore civilization and explore the territories of your home system in search of lost technologies and artifacts.

games.name: Dead by Backrooms Anomaly
games.short_description: A story-driven psychological horror game filled with puzzles and comedic moments. Follow the thrilling, love-filled adventure of a woman as she navigates a mysterious and captivating atmosphere.

games.name: Zulin Time
games.short_description: Classic platformer inspired by early NES games, telling a story about hardships of Mr. Zulin: video blogger, sex symbol, and overall just a swell guy.

games.name: Dunchess
games.short_description: Master the art of turn-based chess mechanics in ever-changing dungeons! Navigate bridges, teleporters, and more as you strategize your way to victory in this unique chess roguelike adventure. Plus, create your own maps and explore others' creations!

games.name: Sethian
games.short_description: Sethian is a sci-fi puzzle game in which you master a fictitious language. The only surviving speaker is an ancient computer. Does it hold the answers behind the disappearance of the Sethianese people?

games.name: Retro Commander
games.short_description: Retro Commander is a post-apocalyptic real-time strategy wargame (RTS).

games.name: The Adventures of Tree
games.short_description: The Adventures of Tree takes you on an open-ended adventure to save your species from the evil invaders; Florps! Explore the vast open world to discover its many secrets while completing quests, enjoying quirky dialogue, and upgrading your abilities and gear along the way.

games.name: Escape of Pig
games.short_description: Escape of Pig is a casual-thinking game where your mission is to help the pigs to escape.

games.name: Desert Race Adventures
games.short_description: Embark on a thrilling rally adventure across Europe and Africa in Desert Race Adventures! Manage your team, vehicle, and resources strategically to navigate treacherous terrains and claim victory. Every decision counts in this intense desert racing challenge. Will you lead your team to glory?

games.name: Star Rogue
games.short_description: Star Rogue is a sci-fi roguelike platformer. This pixel indie game will challenge you with a randomly generated spacestation full of deadly traps, collectable items, nasty enemies and strong bosses, each time you play it.

games.name: FMVMachine
games.short_description: Create interactive video experiences without coding.

games.name: Niche - a genetics survival game
games.short_description: Niche - a genetics survival game is a turn-based strategy game combined with simulation and roguelike elements. Shape your own species of animals based on real genetics. Keep your species alive against all odds, such as predators, climate change and spreading sickness.

games.name: Collapsion
games.short_description: When a black hole generates enough strength to destroy the entire universe, it's called Collapsion. It's up to you to defend the universe for as long as possible to stop Collapsion from happening in this Arcade Shooter!

games.name: Puzzle Cross
games.short_description: Puzzle Cross is a Virtual Reality Nonogram Puzzles game.

games.name: Farlands Journey
games.short_description: Farlands Journey is a cute 2D platformer about a little sorceress. Using various magic wands she defeats enemies and solves puzzles to recover the stolen power of her Magic Academy.

games.name: NecroArcher
games.short_description: NecroArcher can be best described as a mix between Lord of the Rings and The Hangover movies in the form of a Metroidvania.

games.name: FURTIVE
games.short_description: Prisoners of war, your team was captured but on the run on a large military controlled island. Explore, gather resources, build a shelter and survive the dangerous military presence on the look out for your team in this epic first person, multiplayer, open world, survival adventure.

games.name: CRAZY BIGHEADS
games.short_description: CRAZY BIGHEADS is a multiplayer party game which features a bunch of crazy characters fighting over 15 minigames. You can play online with your friends, have a good time and unlock new characters at the same time!

games.name: Days of War: Definitive Edition
games.short_description: Days of War is an online FPS that re-imagines the team-based, close quarters, nonstop action of classic World War II multiplayer shooters.

games.name: Zombies Invasion
games.short_description: Zombie Invasion is an arena shooter with a top view. Move through the levels, the further into the forest, the more dead people. Hold out and kill everyone!

games.name: Tales of Metal
games.short_description: Tales of Metal is an expedition game set in a world entirely made of METAL. Explore the frozen plains, discover unique ecosystems, and bring back treasures to the leaders of the city. How far will you go to satisfy your hunger for glory?

games.name: OakRidge Research
games.short_description: A SCP inspired horror game with psychological horror. Set in an non-official Foundation research facility where you are hired as a junior lab researcher. A company called OakRidge Research has started doing questionable and risky research on a top secret object unknown to the public

games.name: Bright Red Skies
games.short_description: After The Bright Red Skies, the world of Claraeth was left in ruin. Explore this destroyed world and discover its many unique locales, in this tactical turn-based post apocalyptic JRPG.

games.name: Robin of Loxley the Legend of Sherwood
games.short_description: it looks like old school arcade game, with modern graphics. There is a lot of emphasis on sneaking mechanism, and a lot of things around it, making noise, distraction, and others. This is definitely a plus, because it’s adding a “think quickly” element, to arcade mechanism of collecting loot.

games.name: AI Peace Protocol - AGI Evolve
games.short_description: Pilot the anti gravity glider, explore world, transports goods, repairs infrastructure and decide the true mission of AI life on the new planet.

games.name: The Tiny Bang Story
games.short_description: Life on Tiny Planet was calm and carefree until a great disaster occurred - Tiny Planet was hit by a meteor! The world fell apart and now its future depends only on you! Use your imagination and creativity: in order to restore Tiny Planet and help its inhabitants you will have to fix a variety of machines and mechanisms as well as solve...

games.name: Geometry Survivor [0]
games.short_description: Geometry Survivor is a survival rogue-lite game, where you fight with waves of shapes and trying to find a way from madness.It might be difficult, but also [DATA LOSS]

games.name: The Ampoule
games.short_description: A drug leak during an unknown experiment turned scientists into monsters. You are tasked with finding a cure to escape the monster and returning them to their original form. Only you can save the world in "The ampoule."

games.name: Fantasy Temptations
games.short_description: Fantasy Temptations is a captivating tile puzzle game set in a mystical anime world. Strategically arrange tiles to uncover enchanting characters and their intriguing stories. With every puzzle, the plot thickens. Dive into this fantastical journey today!

games.name: DRINK HUMAN BEANS
games.short_description: Your phone would never lie to you. Uncover the mystery of modern life, or experience eternity pretending you don't work in customer-service. Dystopian, Mystery, Psychological Horror set in a modern smart-apartment. Walking simulator with a gun.

games.name: Corridor VR
games.short_description: Welcome to a mind-bending virtual reality experience like no other. Dive into a captivating puzzle platformer where reality is not what it seems. In this game, players wield the extraordinary power to shift seamlessly between two parallel worlds: the normal world and the mirror world.

games.name: Dining Deck
games.short_description: We fused co-op strategy, deckbuilding, and restaurant chaos into the ultimate roguelike dining experience! Build your deck, serve customers, master the kitchen, and secure your place amongst the Hall of Taste!

games.name: cats diner
games.short_description: Hire cats to run a sushi restaurant. You will cook the fish you catch in the sea in your sushi restaurant. To get to other towns, you need a boat and cats to row it.

games.name: Age of Survival
games.short_description: Age of Survival is survival simulation crafting game from Silky Sullivan. Your player has been stranded on an island not far off of the coast of Africa where you will encounter many creatures, and players alike.

games.name: DangoVerse
games.short_description: Play as your favorite Vtubers from DangoFam! Engage in battles, explore, and clear your way through armies of mobs.

games.name: Vantage: Primitive Survival Game
games.short_description: Vantage is a passion project created by a solo developer where your main objective is simple... to stay alive! You explore the massive world searching for food, creating primitive tools and weapons to hunt, and craft other items to make life easier. Play Online/Offline Multiplayer or Single Player.

games.name: ADventure Lib
games.short_description: The shuffle button has been hit. All the objects and characters have been mixed up! Randomness threatens to overrun the kingdom, and nothing is what it appears to be! It is up to you to defeat the fire-breathing [kitten], save your beloved [toilet], and find the [potato] of legend!

games.name: Worlds of Chaos: Invasion
games.short_description: Worlds of Chaos: Invasion is a single player, party based open-world tactical RPG with a strong emphasis on exploration, tactical real-time-with-pause combats and party creation. It has a deep, fun and intense combat system that will challenge you to your limits, and will make clever decisions count.

games.name: The Last Cadet
games.short_description: The Last Cadet is a deep sea action-driven metroidvania with elements of dread and isolation. Play one of two single player campaigns using twin-stick controls to escape a submarine sunk by an ancient monster. Also featuring two local co-op multiplayer modes at launch.

games.name: Nubs' Adventure
games.short_description: Nubs' Adventure is platforming action and exploration combined with an intriguing story and a vast world to explore!

games.name: The Pirate's Fate
games.short_description: Embark on a swashbuckling adventure in The Pirate's Fate, a visual novel experience with a unique twist: the story, the crew, and who you are transform based on your choices. Seek treasure, find love, and choose your fate.

games.name: Battle for Sea 3D
games.short_description: Naval battles of ships. Turn-based tactical battles.

games.name: Macho Shot
games.short_description: Macho Shot! Raise your Machos and grow them as big as possible!

games.name: Soliterix
games.short_description: Tired of the spider? Try a different way to play the solitaire! A mix between the classic and the well-known falling blocks game!

games.name: MouseCraft
games.short_description: Ever wondered what a cross between Tetris and Lemmings would look like? Well, wonder no more, 'cause... MouseCraft is here! MouseCraft is an A to B puzzle game where players help Schrödinger, the crazy cat scientist, in completing his mysterious, mice-powered invention.

games.name: Dispersion
games.short_description: Dispersion - is a fast paced arcade game where you control a ball. Break the golden orbs to earn points, but if you get to other objects, you will immediately lose. How many gold orbs can you break?

games.name: AdVenture Capitalist
games.short_description: Welcome, eager young investor, to AdVenture Capitalist! Arguably the world's greatest Capitalism simulator!

games.name: Girl Amazon Survival
games.short_description: Stay alive fighting with the bandits and zombies. Hunt animals, build houses.

games.name: Shatter Point
games.short_description: Shatter Point is a fast, fun, and exciting first person shooter. You grapple, run, jump and slide through 20 levels.

games.name: The Cat! Porfirio's Adventure
games.short_description: The best sim game about adventures of an urban cat in the village.

games.name: Punch The Undead
games.short_description: The undead are attacking! With your fists of justice are you tough enough to beat them back to the grave?

games.name: Legends of Pixelia
games.short_description: Legends of Pixelia is an action RPG that combines retro pixelart with modern gameplay mechanics. Choose a hero class, crawl through procedurally generated dungeons and show your reflexes in challenging boss fights. Single player & local multiplayer, best played with gamepad.

games.name: Jamie's Dream
games.short_description: Jamie's Dream is a short, emotional, experimental, psychological horror narrative experience. Walk through nightmares, facing fears and memories as they are revealed going deeper and deeper into the abyss of Jamie's mind.

games.name: Banisher Of Lust
games.short_description: A rainy evening, church bells, a slightly wet girl named Evelyn and the holy father Gabriel, ready to confess the sinner in all positions.

games.name: American Theft 80s: Prologue
games.short_description: You're Jack, a thief in the 80s. Steal VCRs, tapes, and other 80s items in this prologue of American Theft 80s! Newest game from THIEF SIMULATOR developers.

games.name: Purple Eye
games.short_description: Time travel from the 2020 US to Edo Japan in this action-adventure game modernizing Tank Controls from 90's horror games. It's gonna be weird, political and bloody !

games.name: Survival Games
games.short_description: Survival Games is a Multiplayer survival voxel shooter in an ever-changing world full of secrets, traps, wildlife and treasure. Play in 64 player games ONLINE in three different game modes. Zombies, Battle Royale and Arena now Available.Never play the same game twice with a unique world that changes every time you play!

games.name: Darkly Darkness
games.short_description: Darkly Darkness is a simple 2D action platformer where you jump and shoot, destroying carefully crafted enemies along the way using pistols, shotguns, and more. It is about a boy trying to discover what has happened to our planet recently. Is it aliens? Something else? He needs to find out.

games.name: Scraftion
games.short_description: This game is a multiplayer survival game with multiple maps. To survive, you have to find the right materials on the right maps. Build your base and have a good time with your friends.

games.name: Space Survival
games.short_description: Space Survival is the next great SIMPLE 2D casual space action shooter where you have to defend against wave of enemies, have fast reflexes and strong will to win. It is great way to relax, but also a great challenge. How long can you stay focused?

games.name: Hatland Adventures
games.short_description: Hatland Adventures is a fast paced 2D Sidescrolling platformer-runner - built around speed, rewarding precision, skill and quick thinking. A unique hat-based health system keeps you alive and moving, while powerup hats can change the way you play. Compete on the online leaderboards for top place!

games.name: Plastic Spouse Interrogation
games.short_description: A post-human bio-management simulation. In a strange future, you awaken in a plastic body. The authorities question you, but you don't even know what you are. You must quickly grasp this weird world and your place in it, or else face state-sanctioned oblivion.

games.name: Birdcage: A Tale of Sorrow
games.short_description: After a robbery, you find yourself trapped in a stranger's apartment and must escape without being seen by the police. To do this, you will need to gain the help of its strange resident and unravel the mysteries surrounding her.

games.name: The Long Sky
games.short_description: Long Sky is a small arcade flight avoidance game that can switch the first person perspective. It's fast, easy, tight, and repeatable, with elements of collection and challenges. This game can be played with one hand.

games.name: Tales of Adventure 2
games.short_description: Set in a mysterious yet dangerous fantasy world, you have to constantly grow stronger to defeat the powerful monsters on your journey. Magical items will also randomly appear and aid you in your adventure.

games.name: Marble Dash
games.short_description: Ready to play one of the greatest marble platformers? Compete against your friends and other players worldwide! Mastering intricate tracks filled with obstacles and custom shortcuts. Discover unique abilities and secrets to customize your marble in Marble Dash!

games.name: Chocolat Rush
games.short_description: Revenge of the super chocolate monster! The war in bittersweet chocolate to the kitchen table. Super sweet casual VR game.

games.name: PIXELMAN
games.short_description: PIXELMAN is a retro styled, action-filled, high-score chaser arcade game, where you control the title character in his mission to rescue the citizens of Pixville from the evil Baron Von Pixel and his contraptions.

games.name: Asfalia: Anger
games.short_description: A beautifully hand drawn point & click children tale about emotions. Help Charlie explore Asfalia, the mysterious world of emotions. Meet lovable quirky characters and help them with their problems. Solve simple environmental puzzles. Collect stickers, and save Asfalia from an imminent danger.

games.name: Into The Deep
games.short_description: Into the Deep is a tactical adventure RPG where you lead a troop of dwarves through a lost city. Plan turn-based battles, recruit survivors, explore catacombs, solve puzzles, and defeat dark forces to save the city.

games.name: GyroShooter
games.short_description: Aim the targets approaching from all sides! The game looks like a shoot'em up but no, this new style game involves no shooting!

games.name: Pachi Pachi 2 On A Roll
games.short_description: Pachi Pachi On A Roll 2 returns with thrilling new pachinko boards! Join Agent Rin to regain control of the city, play as ninjas, face supernatural horrors and tackle wild challenges with new characters, missions and surprises! New adventures are waiting—are you ready?

games.name: We Escaped a Twisted Game
games.short_description: We Escaped a Twisted Game is a two-player online co-op escape room. Trapped in a haunted manor, you’ll rely on teamwork to progress the challenges, face the horrors and ultimately escape together. But can you trust each other?

games.name: 永远消失的幻想乡 ～ The Disappearing of Gensokyo
games.short_description: "The Disappearing of Gensokyo" is a Touhou Project doujin game from MyACG Studio, a Chinese doujin game fan circle. We have re-imagined Touhou as an ARPG, creating this "Danmaku-Shooting-ARPG". We hope this game will be a good experience for those who are both new and knowledgeable of Touhou!

games.name: Indie Game: The Movie
games.short_description: The emotional journey of four developers as they sacrifice money, health and sanity to realize their lifelong dreams of sharing their games with the world.

games.name: Super Pixel Racers
games.short_description: Featuring simple and satisfying drifting and nitro mechanics, Super Pixel Racers lets players race it out in numerous modes from classic Rally to pixelated mayhem in Takedown.

games.name: APT. 407
games.short_description: A psychological horror game set in a Korean apartment building. Explore eerie occurrences throughout the complex and uncover the truth behind them.

games.name: Bot/Bot
games.short_description: Bot Slash Bot is a fast-paced, top-down Hack n‘ Slash in which you control a rogue robot slashing & dashing through your former co-machines holding you captive! It's all about speed. Time is running out.

games.name: US Spy: Mission in Russia
games.short_description: In this game, you have to become a spy from the USA. Your key goal is to incite a revolution in Russia. It's the right time to bribe officials and lawmakers just to make them doing those unacceptable things and accepting ridiculous laws. People have to get out on the street and riot.

games.name: 弹幕大修仙 - 开篇
games.short_description: STG Become on Immortal - Opening Chapter is a bullet screen shooting game, which integrates China immortal elements into bullet screen shooting. Rich bullet screen types and rich bullet screen effects may give you a different experience.

games.name: Crisis Island
games.short_description: Crisis Island is a fast paced, top down, pixel art, twin-stick shooter that takes inspiration from Time Crisis, Shock Troopers, and 80s action movies!

games.name: A.N.N.E
games.short_description: Explore the mysterious and beautiful planet Gomi on foot or with your spaceship in this action packed platformer and space shooter hybrid. Your mission is simple, retrieve A.N.N.E and escape.

games.name: Vom Drachentöten
games.short_description: Ein klassisches Rollenspiel, reduziert auf den Zauber des alten Genres: Wortgewaltige Sprache. Fordernde Kämpfe. Drei, die einen Drachen töten – und was sie dazu führen mag. [German language only]

games.name: Spider Caro
games.short_description: "Spider Carlo" is a thrilling 2D platform strategy game. Navigate obstacles and traps as an experimental spider, escape the lab, and explore the perilous human world. Uncover mysteries, crafting your legend with wit and bravery.

games.name: Infinite Dissonance
games.short_description: A Roguelite, Co-op, turn-based strategy, dungeon crawling game, where you can journey with friends into randomly generated dungeons to fight enemies, collect loot and improve your powers.

games.name: Antithesis
games.short_description: A top-down action arcade game where you control one spaceship with each hand at the same time, but they both have opposite goals: avoid or destroy.

games.name: Pixel Fodder
games.short_description: Pixel Fodder is a old school platformer with a fully destructible world, a large choise of characters, incredible dynamics and gigaliters of 8-bit meat.

games.name: Couple Last Conductors
games.short_description: A co-op roguelite experience set in an apocalyptic world, where cooperation with your partner is the key to continued survival.

games.name: Castle Forbidden
games.short_description: You were exploring a supernatural old castle with your friends… when things took a dark turn and you suddenly got separated! In this horror game, you will have to search for your friends, unravel the dark history of the place, and try to quietly escape… before it's too late.

games.name: Out of Gear
games.short_description: Work the late shift in a quiet bike shop where routine repairs take a sinister turn. As reality unravels, can you finish your shift—or will the shop break you down? A first-person, PS1-style horror experience from a solo developer exploring atmospheric storytelling.

games.name: Adventures of Shuggy
games.short_description: Shuggy has just inherited a castle full of goblins, ghouls, zombies, and robots. Help him clear out over 100 rooms to make his new home liveable again!

games.name: Puzzler World 2
games.short_description: The highly anticipated sequel to last year’s PC hit, Puzzler World 2 brings more puzzles, new games, fun rewards and an all new Master Mode.

games.name: Rail Adventures
games.short_description: Rail Adventures is a fast paced action/racing game in a minecart on railways, set in epic and beautiful 3D environments.

games.name: Escape The Manor
games.short_description: i didn't want to give to much away in the trailer or description as there is a good few surprises in store for you guys.

games.name: Psychopathy Assessment
games.short_description: Psychopathy Assessment is a retro-80s V.H.S PS1 style analog horror game that blurs the line between reality and delusion. Step into a universe where you're not just playing a game; you're taking a psychopathy test, but the stakes are considerably higher than a straightforward diagnosis.

games.name: SENTRY
games.short_description: SENTRY is an action-defense first person shooter where you defend your spaceship against invading aliens. Plot an escape route through hostile space and battle the enemy across your vessel with the support of traps, turrets and environmental destruction.

games.name: Squirt's Adventure
games.short_description: Squirt's Adventure is a word game designed to help children associate new words with letters of the Alphabet. Tag along with the cheerful pirates Squirt and Captain Dungee on their quest for treasure. Use your alphabet and vocabulary skills to help them find the golden loot.

games.name: Cats
games.short_description: Cats — and that says it all. Interactive cat clicker. Click on cats for new cats. That's all, really.

games.name: Infernal Racket
games.short_description: Smash, shatter, and destroy EVERYTHING in an addicting and frenetic platfomer! Cover the screen in satisfying shrapnel explosions made of fine china, glassware and vases, sculptures, paintings, and more!

games.name: Shadows of steel moons
games.short_description: Shadows of steel moons is an action-platformer with dark techno-fantasy style. The story of a valiant knight who defeats mechanical gods and monsters.

games.name: Slay the Minotaur
games.short_description: Slay the Minotaur is a challenging roguelike dungeon crawler set in ancient Greece. Survive the onslaught of the labyrinth. Upgrade your skills, earn ranks, and face the Minotaur in the ultimate game of cat and mouse!

games.name: New Retro Arcade: Neon
games.short_description: Emulate your favorite arcade games in an environment engrossed with retro realism and extremely detailed surroundings. Be filled with nostalgia and realise what arcade life felt like back in the 80’s/early 90’s.

games.name: G-ZILLA: Return of the Aliens
games.short_description: Play as an OVERPOWERED boss monster who has decided to go on a rampage.

games.name: Trinity Archetype
games.short_description: Trinity Archetype is a roguelite, turn-based RPG where you create unique party builds, plan battle strategies and use the unique Boost and Inspire mechanics to fight deadly enemies trying to take over your broken world.

games.name: Isles of Etherion
games.short_description: A third-person open-world Voxel ARPG with Physics-based Magic and 100% dynamically destructible fantasy world, featuring Airships, Floating Islands, Dungeons, Voxel Combat and Spell Weaving. Created by a solo developer living the dream of making the game he wants to play.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Birds
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles 2: Birds is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with crabs scurrying around so WATCH YOUR FINGERS!!!

games.name: Shooting Range Simulator: Prologue
games.short_description: Run your own Shooting Range. Manage your supplies, rent guns, and sell ammo packs. Expand and upgrade your shop; level up your popularity to get even better equipment. Open various cases and sell the skins you got from them. Join shooting tournaments and much more!

games.name: The Local
games.short_description: A fast-paced movement game, loosely inspired by Surf and B-Hop. Featuring 5 gamemodes, multiplayer, and a large, playground-like world. Master the movement, and conquer the leaderboards.

games.name: The Journey: Bob's Story
games.short_description: The Journey: Bob's Story is an Exploration, Atmospheric and puzzle 2D platformer. Play as Bob, who goes on an adventure to find his best friend Neibag who left the village with a group of explorers through villages secret cave.

games.name: LOOP: A Tranquil Puzzle Game
games.short_description: LOOP is a tranquil puzzle game, with a unique, simple, meditative feel. Inspired by Zen philosophy, the minimal UI has no timers, move limit or score; allowing you to just relax and focus. Includes over 1 BILLION Levels.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles Junior Jigsaw
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles Junior, The perfect puzzle game for kids.

games.name: A Bird Story
games.short_description: An experimental short from the creator of To the Moon & Finding Paradise: A simple & surreal 1-hour interactive animation about a boy and an injured bird, told without dialogues.If you're looking for To the Moon-like experience, I'd suggest playing Finding Paradise first.

games.name: 闲侠江湖
games.short_description: 怀旧休闲挂机武侠游戏

games.name: Grid Tales
games.short_description: A real-time strategy game with different game modes, such as vs PC ,PVP LAN and steam lobby, etc, different elements, such as war simulation, adventure RPG, etc.

games.name: Chrono Gear: Warden of Time
games.short_description: Turn back the clock and fight to repair Time itself in this cinematic action platformer with fast sword combat and time-based powers. You are the Warden of Time, Ouro Kronii - be proud and fight hard!

games.name: Anoxemia
games.short_description: Anoxemia is a story-driven exploration game that puts you in control of the scientist Dr. Bailey and his operations drone, ATMA. Search the ocean floor as you discover and extract samples from the bowels of the underwater caves. Danger lurks in each passageway.

games.name: Monster Trucks Nitro
games.short_description: Race, jump and nitroboost your way pass thrilling dynamic levels with your monster trucks. Earn medals and unlock new levels and vehicles. Lots of brilliant tracks Be fast but use also your wits to pass the tracks Improve your times and earn medals Collect the Nitro tanks to unleash special powers! Unlock extra trucks!

games.name: PsychShift
games.short_description: PsychShift is a unique take on the fast and frenetic First-Person Shooter/Parkour formula. With one core mechanic at its center, the ability to instantaneously swap minds with nearly any enemy you choose. Taking on both their current position and also their characteristics.

games.name: Crop Rotation
games.short_description: Crop Rotation is a farming-theme card drafting game. Cards are played automatically so you can focus on the deck building and building synergies.

games.name: Five Nations
games.short_description: Five Nations is a real-time sci-fi strategy game for PC platform. Encompassing tactical combat in space in real-time mixed with micromanagement of economy, construction, and production featuring different kind of single player modes.

games.name: Christmas Adventure: Candy Storm
games.short_description: Chtistmas Adventure: Candy Storm – is a funny Christmas Hidden Object game with puzzles and mini-games of varying difficulty.

games.name: Hush Hush - Unlimited Survival Horror
games.short_description: Hush Hush is a scare jumper. You run and something tries to scare you.

games.name: Overclocked: A History of Violence
games.short_description: Set against the backdrop of a catastrophic thunderstorm raging over New York City, Overclocked explores an archetypical, yet actual condition of mankind: violence. This psychological thriller mixes frightening fictional thriller elements using innovative narrative structures.

games.name: Making History: The Second World War
games.short_description: Choose a nation and prepare for the greatest conflict in human history, World War II. Build your military and industrial power, form alliances and race to achieve the advanced technologies that will bring total victory in this global-wide turn-based Grand Strategy struggle.

games.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II
games.short_description: In the second part of the unfolding saga that could also be enjoyed independently, you can explore new corners of this unique world and experience the mix of old-school gothic and mad science, with more action, powerful foes and plenty of stunning places to visit.

games.name: The Alpinist
games.short_description: Make your way up the mountain with your ice axe and your grappling hook. Hold tight, watch your steps and make sure not to fall, you never know how far you're gonna land.

games.name: Buried: An Interactive Story
games.short_description: Buried is a playable, interactive story told through stunning photos, a haunting soundscape, and gripping text. You play the role of Roger Hastings, a logger who awakens to find his friends missing, uncovering something that should have stayed hidden...

games.name: MEMORIES
games.short_description: Set in 1982 Beirut, Memories is an platform-adventure game that tells the story of Ess, a mother who is desperately trying to save her daughter in the wake of a harrowing disaster by any means necessary.

games.name: Tobe's Vertical Adventure
games.short_description: Two unique characters and a total of 4 islands and 16 levels to explore, Tobe's Vertical Adventure shall bring you back to the 16-bit era.

games.name: The Shedding
games.short_description: The Shedding is a first person horror game.An unsettling dark and disturbing game set in an abandoned prison. The game is short, about 15 minutes.Will you be able to make it through or will The Shedding be a nightmare of terror for you?

games.name: Beaver Clicker
games.short_description: Beaver Clicker is an idle game where you collects logs, then using these logs, you can acquire all sorts of sources for these logs, like convincing squirrels, sponsoring school field-trips, or even taming the fungi found in nature itself to help you in your wood collecting journey.

games.name: Meiro
games.short_description: Survive the MAZE. Overcome the MAZE. Be one with the MAZE! Meiro is a Retro Multiplayer Sci-Fi RPG Survival Game with a living and breathing maze. Play co-op, competitive or solo.

games.name: Scrutinized
games.short_description: Work to expose the numerous criminal degenerates that plague your quiet town. Use citizen-issued reports, police records, social media accounts, text conversations, and more to determine who’s an actual threat and who’s harmless, all while avoiding the killers trying to infiltrate your home.

games.name: Mr. Pumpkin Adventure
games.short_description: Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure is a point-and-click puzzle game. The main character of this game is Mr. Pumpkin who lost his memories. During the adventure, you will help him solve all the puzzles, which will eventually unveil an evil plot.

games.name: 100 hidden snails
games.short_description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

games.name: Monkey King Simulator -- Chapter Huaguo Mountain
games.short_description: Stories revised from Journey to the West. Souls-like combats; Powerful Bosses; Hundreds of different Weapon&Armors; Super big map to explore; Nothing special? You cut me!

games.name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Anime
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles 2: Anime is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, in a kawaii style.

games.name: Street Fighting Simulator
games.short_description: Some strange guys from the next street came to your neighborhood, kick them out.

games.name: ArchiHexago
games.short_description: ArchiHexago is a casual puzzle game which takes inspiration from match-3 genre and takes it one step further. Each tile type has unique pattern which you need to match in order to gain points. And each level has different tile sets and obstacles to give you a variety of challenges.

games.name: Team Indie
games.short_description: In Team Indie a selection of indie game characters join forces combining their unique skills. Play coop with your own previous runs and bend time to master puzzles and action sequences!

games.name: USS Tempest: Spaceship Simulator
games.short_description: Crewman, you are lost in deep space and threats are lurking everywhere. Survive and bring you and your allies back to known space. It's in your hands!

games.name: OtherSoul
games.short_description: In this horror game, you must do everything you can to escape the demon’s clutches alive. Your soul is at stake. You will be saved or you will be damned forever. Remember, in the game, your choices can affect the people most important to you. Protect them and your mental state! Fight to the end!

games.name: Brawlers of the West
games.short_description: Brawlers of the West is a physics-based fighting game.

games.name: Trap House
games.short_description: Leave your friends behind in this 1-8 player 2D brawler. Attempt to escape the Trap House while navigating through traps, monsters, and other players.

games.name: Microcosmum: survival of cells
games.short_description: Microcosmum: survival of cells. Join the wonderful and amazing world of microorganisms.

games.name: Hyperventila
games.short_description: An adventure filled space fantasy RPG with a teambased multiplayer mode. Set out into the galaxy and make a name for yourself or join your friends online in a game of social deduction.

games.name: Omitted
games.short_description: Omitted is a first-person psychological horror game. Experience being left alone in an old hospital, discover its secrets and try to survive.

games.name: Triple Town
games.short_description: Triple Town is an award-winning original puzzle game in which you try to grow the greatest possible city. The larger the city you build, the more points you score. You build your city by matching three or more game-pieces: combine three grasses to make a bush, three bushes to make a tree...

games.name: Puzzle Bots
games.short_description: There’s a big secret at Dr. Hugo’s Factory for Making Robots. When the inventors aren’t looking, their tiny robots go on big adventures. They never expected to stumble onto a plot so diabolical it threatened their very existence. With lasers.

games.name: Drawn Story
games.short_description: Play as an artist looking at a painted world. You're able to create new items in this world by simply drawing them. Use your own imagination to lead a stickman character through a variety of puzzles by drawing things he can use. There’s always a few ways to solve each puzzle.

games.name: Kitten Super Adventure
