games.short_description: Kitten Super Adventure is a game where you play as a kitten and explore 20 worlds, your mission is to collect the stolen catnip bags and bring them back to Cat Islands, only then can you save your kitten companions and stop the islands from sinking!

games.name: Fan Fun
games.short_description: Find the way out of each level, while trying to consumpt, as least energy as possible while moving the ball through the level. Collect all 3 diamond batteries to open the end level door and find a way to exit each level. Try to escape from the level before you run out of energy.

games.name: ARK: Survival Evolved
games.short_description: Stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. Use your cunning to kill or tame the primeval creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive, dominate... and escape!

games.name: Octorridor
games.short_description: You're trying to escape from the Magic Academy, but a powerful spell prevents you from exiting the final corridor. It's possible to break the spell if you pass the final corridor an eighth time without fail.

games.name: CARROT: Pancakes and Waffles
games.short_description: a tiny walking simulator game where you live a peaceful day in a whimsical hand-painted world

games.name: Devil's Hideout
games.short_description: Devil's Hideout is a horror point and click adventure. Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.

games.name: Castle Story
games.short_description: Castle Story is a creative voxel-based strategy game in which you can build castles one brick at a time using an army of little creatures called Bricktrons. Design and build your own castles, expand your territory in a vast landscape and defend your Bricktrons against onslaughts of hostile creatures.

games.name: Pixel Soccer
games.short_description: Pixel Soccer is a top down, pixel art, soccer game inspired by retro soccer games from the 90's.

games.name: Exanimum: The Silent Call
games.short_description: "Exanimum: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets.

games.name: Model City
games.short_description: Welcome to Model City, a calm relaxing small game where you can't lose or do anything wrong.

games.name: Wardwell House VR
games.short_description: This is the VR version of Wardwell House which is an innovative and realistic horror game with outstanding atmosphere. You must find hidden clues and objects of interest that slowly reveal the haunting story. Feel the build-up of fear as you traverse the forest and make your way through the House.

games.name: Dragon Realms - Towers 'n' Dragons
games.short_description: Take on the roles of two ambitious strategists and defend your country against dragons and rebels in this story based tower defense game! Keep an eye out for hidden secrets and act wisely because who knows how the story might end.

games.name: Running Rogue
games.short_description: Running Rogue is a fast-paced first-person roguelike action. Parkour, cool magic gauntlets and tons of undead for you to smash their skulls with a powerful blow!

games.name: Under Lock
games.short_description: Under Lock is a multiplayer asymmetrical PvP horror game for 5 players (4 survivors versus 1 monster). Take the role of a survivor with the goal to outsmart the monster and escape from lockdown. Or choose one from several unique monsters to hunt down and devour the victims.

games.name: Witch girl got killed.
games.short_description: Witch girl got killed. is a first person fantasy horror action game inspired by Japanese anime. Become a witch girl in training and infiltrate the labyrinth that has appeared in town in order to destroy the structure’s brain.

games.name: Tribes & Monsters
games.short_description: Tribes and Monsters is a survivor-like game where you can choose a tribe and become the leader of your own army. Try to collect materials in worlds inhabited by vicious monsters. Craft, upgrade, and enhance your tribe's base to unlock more features, stronger weapons, pets and so much more!

games.name: Adventures of Bertram Fiddle 1: A Dreadly Business
games.short_description: A classic point and click adventure game, featuring weird and wonderful characters, beautiful animation and a fantastic soundtrack. "It is quite possibly one of the finest point-and-click comedy murder mystery adventure games set in Victorian London you will play today" - Bertram Fiddle

games.name: Cave Story+
games.short_description: Run, jump, shoot, fly and explore your way through a massive action-adventure reminiscent of classic 8- and 16-bit games.

games.name: RimWorld
games.short_description: A sci-fi colony sim driven by an intelligent AI storyteller. Generates stories by simulating psychology, ecology, gunplay, melee combat, climate, biomes, diplomacy, interpersonal relationships, art, medicine, trade, and more.

games.name: Hard Way To Heaven
games.short_description: Hard way to heaven is an old-school platformer game, which will take you a lot of effort to complete. You can play it solo, or with a friend on offline split screen mode.

games.name: FindDark
games.short_description: findDark is a first person horror game. You have to find a clue to escape from inside the confined space and use that clue to move to the next place. How long it takes or how to find clues is up to you.Uncover all the mysteries that take place in this game and immerse yourself in storytelling.

games.name: UnderWater Adventure
games.short_description: "UnderWater Adventure" is a 3d action game, with a little part of puzzle.

games.name: The Story Goes On
games.short_description: You are the hero inside the storybook of an obsessed author pondering with his life’s work. Explore repeating worlds, befriend a talking scarecrow and swing your sword really fast, while uncovering the true, overarching adventure within.

games.name: Mage's Initiation: Reign of the Elements
games.short_description: D'arc is a sixteen-year-old Mage to be. A sinister plot threatens his initiation and risks plunging the land of Iginor into conflict and chaos. Choose from four classes and train in the Elemental arts. Master a unique range of spells to solve puzzles, battle monsters, and confront the ultimate evil.

games.name: Cat Life Simulator
games.short_description: Cat Life Simulator is a realistic simulation game that allows you to see the world through the eyes of a cat. Explore the world, interact with the environment, and create your own cat's story. Your adventure begins in a domestic setting, but over time, you will discover many other places.

games.name: Ball Army vs Zombie
games.short_description: A real-time strategy survival game. The picture quality is beautiful，Powered by Unreal Engine 5 （UE5） Place balls to block zombies Don't let zombies into the house Player's hand speed, strategy matching, ball matching, Protect the surviving humans, the ball warriors protect the humans

games.name: A Story About My Uncle
games.short_description: A Story About My Uncle is a first person platforming adventure game about a boy who searches for his lost uncle, and ends up in a world he couldn’t imagine existed. The movement is a crucial part of the games core gameplay – focusing on swinging through the world with a grappling hook that gives the player a wonderful sense of speed and...

games.name: Aircraft Evolution
games.short_description: Take part in aerial battles with warplanes from different eras — from World War I to the future. Drop bombs, upgrade your aircraft, and turn enemy bases into rubble in the explosive action game Aircraft Evolution!

games.name: Hero Vs 1000
games.short_description: Experience the adrenaline of facing countless hordes of enemies in an unparalleled challenge! Command a knight, a pirate and a soldier in epic battles, each with 1000 opponents waiting to test your courage and skill.

games.name: Trundle
games.short_description: Trundle is a simplistic 3-D platformer where you must navigate a ball through a world of floating platforms.

games.name: Archibald's Adventures
games.short_description: A paranoid computer issued a lock down on a mad scientist's mansion after his experiments and security robots broke loose, and you are trapped inside! Overcome all the pitfalls of the mansion in this action puzzle game! Test your skills and wit in nearly 200 levels!

games.name: Ultimate Tag
games.short_description: Compete with friends in the fast-paced, 2D platformer! Chase each other through various unique maps, using quick reflexes and maneuverability to avoid being "it". Collect powers along the way to help dash, freeze and teleport your way to the top!

games.name: They Bleed Pixels
games.short_description: They Bleed Pixels is a fiendishly difficult action platformer inspired by H.P. Lovecraft and classic horror.

games.name: The Sandbox
games.short_description: READY FOR CRAFTING VIRTUAL WORLDS ON YOUR PC?The acclaimed world-building game featuring a unique mission-based approach is coming onto PC via Steam Early Access. With over 16 million players on mobile & tablets versions and 1,500,000 pixel blocks creations shared in the Online Gallery to date, this PC version is taking world...

games.name: Desktop Basketball
games.short_description: Your desk is the court! Dribble, shoot, and dunk your way to victory!

games.name: Sincerely, Stampy
games.short_description: Abducted... by aliens? No! By Astral Entities!! Welcome to the Astral Plane. You and four other Humans have been selected. In the next two weeks, please explore the facility, collect stamps, make friends, and uncover multiple endings. We'll be watching your progress. Best of luck, Human.

games.name: Streamer's Journey 💖
games.short_description: Streaming for attention seemed harmless at first... but Tania’s dive into online fame quickly spirals into a dangerous world of exploitation and desire. Will she find herself, or lose everything? 😈

games.name: RogueVerse
games.short_description: Rogue-lite role-playing dungeon crawler featuring extremely fast tactical battles and highly competitive leaderboard! Help a party of four heroes descend into the underground city of Shadows to find and engage the Dungeon Lord!

games.name: Wills and Wonders
games.short_description: Wills and Wonders is a turn based strategy game in a fantasy setting. Wills and Wonders brings you on an adventure through Earth's mythology as you embark on quests to capture creatures, find skills, and recruit new leaders. Build armies, take land, and assert your dominance over all of Midgard.

games.name: Historica Fantasia
games.short_description: In the land known as Siegeland Empire, the assassination of the Emperor has brought the Nation under a Civil War. After being convicted for the Murder of her Father, Player will have to journey across the land toward the Capital, and claim the Throne to end the War.

games.name: Slenderman: Unbecoming
games.short_description: Slenderman: Unbecoming is a new adaptation on the supernatural entity Slenderman. The game describes the events of a park ranger haunted by Slenderman. Go the right way, and you just may save yourself from the Slenderman.

games.name: Haunting Hour
games.short_description: Cooperate in this Cross-platform Multiplayer Virtual Reality Escape Room to escape the Witch’s Castle. Pit your wits against twisted puzzles and crazy challenges as you and your fellow imprisoned ghosts race against time. There's only an hour until the Haunting Hour begins, will you make it out?

games.name: Hidden World of Art 2
games.short_description: In the hidden object game "Hidden World of Art 2" you have to restore real classical paintings by finding hidden items and solving puzzles!

games.name: Analogue: A Hate Story
games.short_description: A dark visual mystery novel featuring transhumanism, traditional marriage, loneliness, and cosplay. Two pursuable characters. Five endings. Welcome to the future.

games.name: Abduction Prologue: The Story Of Jonathan Blake
games.short_description: In this survival horror game, play as Jonathan Blake who is awaken at night to find that he is not alone. Work your way through the apartment and try to survive your attempted ABDUCTION.

games.name: Momonga Pinball Adventures
games.short_description: Momonga is a unique pinball game, where you bounce a flying squirrel through different levels. Enemies, boss fights, exploration - it has all the ingredients of good old action-adventure games, but with flippers!

games.name: Fortix
games.short_description: Can you reclaim your ancestors’ land? Evil forces have taken over the once fertile land of Fortiana. You are the only one who can storm the castles and claw it back from the hordes of dragons. Experience a new type of strategy and arcade game. Fence off parts of the battlefield to corner your enemies.

games.name: Making History II: The War of the World
games.short_description: What if Germany won the Battle of Britain? What if Moscow fell in 1942?You’re in charge. Anything can happen and history will never repeat itself in this classic WWII grand strategy game MAKING HISTORY II: The War of the World. Are you ready to battle for global dominance?

games.name: TIMEframe
games.short_description: Time is relative. Sometimes 10 seconds can feel like an eternity... In TIMEframe you will discover a world in slow motion. Explore the remnants of a mysterious civilization on the brink of destruction.

games.name: Gumboy - Crazy Adventures™
games.short_description: Gumboy has fun and novel gameplay set in a richly imagined world. With simple game controls, Gumboy lets the player bounce, roll, float, and fly through the world. Additionally, Gumboy can change size, shape and material.

games.name: CometStriker DX
games.short_description: CometStriker DX is a fast-paced arcade-style shooter where you boost through danger and blast everything in your way!

games.name: Retro/Grade
games.short_description: Play a classic Shoot 'Em Up... in reverse!

games.name: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth)
games.short_description: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth) is interesting puzzle game for everyone. Get ready to face different types of challenges in the game.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

games.name: Little Cells
games.short_description: Look through a microscope and discover a small world made of ever expanding cells. Try to stay alive the longer you can, and beat your score, or your friends’ high scores.

games.name: Desaturation Point
games.short_description: A Strategic Squad-Based Horror Game in which players navigate across arctic labyrinths overrun by freakishly colorful monstrosities in this 'Lovecraft-on-LSD' experience.

games.name: T-Kara Puzzles
games.short_description: Unique match-4 puzzle game, filled with fun variations and exciting challenges!

games.name: Adventures On The Polluted Islands
games.short_description: Adventures On The Polluted Islands – adventure game with elements of sandbox. You will play a small crab, armed with a boomerang. Help the survivors and go in search of salvation. Tasks, secrets, boss fights, easter eggs and much more are waiting for you!

games.name: Make it indie!
games.short_description: Claw your way through the abyss of the mind and survive the horrors that stalk you as you attempt to survive seven days as... an Indie Developer.

games.name: Food and Girls
games.short_description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

games.name: Laser Sounds
games.short_description: You are a mercenary hired by the Space Company to inspect the space station, which has not been heard from for years, because of the news you have received that some experiments are being carried out. Your goal is to clear everyone from this space station.

games.name: Block Story™
games.short_description: There isn’t much better than a wide open game world in which you have essentially no limits and can alter the very landscape in which you play – that is, unless you add dragons, of course…

games.name: Adventurer Manager
games.short_description: Reunite the kingdom of Adventuria and defeat the evil Illusionist Miraj by recruiting Adventurers to send on Adventures for epic loot and rewards in this RPG/Management Sim with tons of depth, randomization, and customization options!

games.name: Jelly Party: Fire
games.short_description: A refreshing and fun shooting game, you only need to aim and shoot the tiles flying in all directions. Enjoy shooting in relaxing music!

games.name: Tales of Spark
games.short_description: "Tales of Spark" is a Hack & Slash Action RPG with an Eastern flair. Players assume the role of a young wandering swordsman, exploring the vast desert, seeking treasures, defeating powerful bosses, and even slaying gigantic celestial dragons.

games.name: Brick Breaker
games.short_description: A game about destroying bricks and stop them from spreading. Unlock balls with unique attacks that help you get further and defeat all 14 bosses. Build up a base, gather resources and use them to improve your stats. Dont let the bricks touch you!

games.name: STE : Save The Earth
games.short_description: An alien invasion has come! As the supreme general of the armed forces of the earth, your mission will be to gather an army and put an end to the threat. Make your way through one of the most complex clicker games out there and crown yourself as The Supreme Defender!

games.name: Child of the Wind
games.short_description: Navigate your oriental ship safely across the many table-top seas using two hand-fans to influence the wind. Steer enemy ships into ruins and avoid natural dangers, including thrashing whirlpools while collecting your cargo and bringing it to safety in a beautiful, Japanese-inspired environment.

games.name: WASP
games.short_description: W.A.S.P. is an intense rogue-lite with fast-paced, enemy-swarming chaos with the action-packed shooting of classic SHMUPs. Players take control of powerful airborne ships to fend off waves of increasingly difficult enemies while navigating levels from outer space to desert planets.

games.name: Real Or Fake
games.short_description: Find and eliminate the real players hiding among numerous AI. With simple controls and an easy-to-navigate UI, players of all ages can enjoy the game. Explore a variety of maps and diverse gimmicks, and play with up to 20 people, including your friends!

games.name: Jerez's Arena Ⅱ
games.short_description: In the corner of the kingdom, Sigrid, the daughter of the Regent of the kingdom and one of the eight founding fathers of the Ekner family, secretly becomes a gladiator behind the family's back.

games.name: 《述梦》
games.short_description: 《述梦》is a first-person 3D game that combines word puzzle solving with survival. You will search for supplies to survive on a cursed island and explore the memories of the dead and free their souls.

games.name: Pixel Galaxy
games.short_description: A non-shooting shoot 'em up where you must grow, make friends, and survive together.

games.name: Creature Pedia 怪物手冊
games.short_description: A broke college student accidentally takes a job from a mysterious Magic Academy—oops. Now you’re stuck solving magical mishaps, meeting NPCs, collecting odd materials, and summoning monsters to survive this chaotic campus.

games.name: Dwarf Digger
games.short_description: Dig, discover, and survive! In Dwarf Digger, you build your own underground empire, unearth precious treasures, battle hidden dangers, and trade with fellow dwarves. Will you carve your legend deep beneath the earth?

games.name: WINCH IT OUT
games.short_description: Master your off-road driving skills, use your car's unique powers and conquer the most challenging peaks. This is a Hardcore, Physics-based, Driving Platformer. Are you ready to WINCH IT OUT?

games.name: Contradiction: Spot The Liar
games.short_description: Spot the lie and beat the liars in 'Contradiction' - the all-video murder mystery adventure!

games.name: VHSoverdose
games.short_description: VHSoverdose is an unrelenting assault of outlandish action, served up with thick juicy slice of anatomical annihilation! Set inside of the confides of a simple 80's Arcade Machine... Or is it?

games.name: Space Depression
games.short_description: You must do your best to protect the world! Destroy all enemies. Get the highest score.

games.name: Puzzle Strike
games.short_description: Puzzle Strike is an online deckbuilding puzzle game from David Sirlin, lead designer of Puzzle Fighter HD Remix and creator of the Fantasy Strike universe. Improve your deck (of chips!) as the game unfolds and crush your opponents under a mountain of gems!

games.name: Konike
games.short_description: Konike is a turn-based strategy RPG about hunting ghosts for money. Play as a man down on his luck as he uses probability-powered Finder devices to locate invisible spirits in rural America. Use both your skill and intuition to survive, all while uncovering the mystery of your own past and future.

games.name: The Last of them
games.short_description: You play as a detective solving gruesome murders in a haunting, desolate city. Explore dark alleys, uncover hidden clues, and solve puzzles to unravel the mystery. Can you find the killer before they strike again, or will you fall victim to the terror?

games.name: Bear No Grudge
games.short_description: Take control of Bear and shoot, skate, race your way to justice across multiple locations in this action adventure game with a bite.

games.name: Ryo The Haunted Office
games.short_description: Ryo The Haunted Office is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game where you play as a Paranormal enthusiast who have to investigate the haunted office for the proof of the paranormal.

games.name: Kitten Madness
games.short_description: Kitten Madness is an open world fast pace game where you race a kitten through various levels and game types. Kitten Madness starts out as a single player game where you control a cute kitten performing the playful actions of a kitten.

games.name: BattleBlade
games.short_description: BattleBlade is a 2D Fighter game with Bullet Hell elements featuring a story-based campaign about Gods and Demons fighting for Earth. Read visual novel style dialogue to discover the truth! BattleBlade also features a local multiplayer versus mode allowing you to battle your friends!

games.name: Bolt Riley, A Reggae Adventure
games.short_description: Bolt Riley is a a classic 2D point and click Jamaican Reggae adventure game where you play as Bolt Riley, a poor boy from Trenchtown, Jamaica, on his pathway to stardom. Bolt is struggling to survive and has to deal with a gang of Rude Boys.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Christmas
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles 2: Christmas is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, in a festive style.

games.name: Dead Pixels II
games.short_description: Dead Pixels II: Straight to Video is a procedurally generated side scrolling shooter set in a post apocalyptic city in the near future of 1991. Fight your way through the hordes of the undead as you try to find a way out of the city.

games.name: 東方連珠
games.short_description: An online battle game where you place girls from Gensokyo like in a game of Go! However, since the goal is to compete based on how well they get along, you can only win when the girls next to each other are friends. Enjoy the strategies created by their abilities and relationships!

games.name: Fury of West
games.short_description: Fury of West - Top Down Shooter, a top down shooter game, where your mission is to control a cowboy with an unusual revolver, your task is to look for ways out of the intricate labyrinths of the Wild West, simultaneously shooting back from thugs, avoiding the spikes and arrows

games.name: Star Fleet Armada Rogue Adventures
games.short_description: Captain a fleet of ships. Meet new races. Explore other star systems. Discover and explore anomalies, asteroid fields, nebulas, suns, comets and more. Can you find that rare Rainbow planet that is teeming with mass amounts of resources? Play as any of the 45 races. Earn Achievements to get rare in game artifacts!

games.name: Gordian Rooms 2: A curious island
games.short_description: Your adventure continues in Gordian Rooms 2... The escape island game where you venture further into the mysteries of the Gordian Society! Challenge your wits and conquer every puzzle on the Isle of Lye!

games.name: Forsaken Universe
games.short_description: Forsaken Universe is an exploration-survival game based on a unique universe. Become one of the Elite space explorers in the universe by completing missions, building a strong base, killing space pirates and or aliens, or many different other ways. Can you explore all the planets and survive?

games.name: Gaming Copilot
games.short_description: Gaming Copilot is your AI gaming buddy, providing you with precise guides. With efficient assistance from intelligent models and powerful databases, it supports instant voice responses and excellent screenshot analysis. It can also share jokes with you! Let's game with Copilot for a blast!

games.name: Air Offense Command
games.short_description: Side scrolling shooter in which you lead a desperate preemptive strike to save your homeland from annihilation.

games.name: Wok This Way
games.short_description: Step into the shoes of a Chinese restaurant owner, bringing Chinese cuisine to your community. From cooking delicious dishes, crafting custom menus, designing your restaurant, hiring the right staff, and providing top-tier service, every detail counts if you want to become the ultimate restaurateur!

games.name: Melting Hearts: Our Love Will Grow 2
games.short_description: The harsh winter conditions make farming almost impossible. Ancient farming secrets must now be unlocked as you are forced to learn to grow crops in winter and make friends and enemies in an equally icy social climate.

games.name: Trained by a Succubus
games.short_description: “Trained by a Succubus” is our new Casual game, where you must survive training by a real Succubus. With awesome 2D animation, this is a must play!

games.name: Godsend
games.short_description: Godsend is an action-adventure melee slasher set during the Crusades.

games.name: Super X Chess
games.short_description: A chess game where you can combine your own pieces by capturing them. The combined piece moves as both pieces that got combined or with new rules when combining two pieces of same type. It's improving chess by making it more exciting & dynamic.

games.name: Super Goribei
games.short_description: Super Goribei is a retro style platformer with small comic like story. Super Goribei is what could be called a pixelated animated mess but with lots of care to the mess all made by the dev. and is right for your faces with this mario clone that now has 46 levels and 2 boss battles for the good of pixel man kind and more to come.

games.name: Holobunnies: The Bittersweet Adventure
games.short_description: An action-exploration, retro sidescroller adventure game about holographic bunnies in space.

games.name: TwoKinds Online
games.short_description: Welcome to the world of TwoKinds, where you can live a fantasy life! Take jobs, craft, or fight in this large virtual world.

games.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing
games.short_description: Put on your wide-brimmed hat, grab your weapons and embark on an incredible adventure in the gothic-noir world of Borgovia, where mad science threatens the fragile peace between monster and mortal.

games.name: AirMech Command
games.short_description: AirMech Command is the definitive Action/RTS experience in VR. With all new tactical room-space controls AND ground-level flight controls, you can command troops and units from orbit, or grab the stick and pilot your AirMech directly. Lots of mechs, units, and unlockable vanity items--no microtrans!

games.name: 우리들의 4분 33초
games.short_description: "Maybe...we all are deaf." This is a sweet-bitter story based on modern times. Also, this is a visual novel game with simple menu and using click or space bar to play, without no choice. Although, this game is not a simulation game only for love.

games.name: Tenement
games.short_description: A frantic 2D arena shooter against up to 64 bots. Play Free-For-All or Mission Mode. Unlock guns, perks and characters. Call in helicopters, airstrikes and nukes!

games.name: Opus 1 - Social Justice War
games.short_description: Shoot down fascists and free humanity from bigotry!

games.name: Oxide Room 104
games.short_description: A bone-chilling body-horror game with escape room gameplay. Bad decisions have brought Matthew to this terrifying motel. Now it’s up to you to decide how to escape - will you make it out alive?

games.name: The Curse of Feldar Vale
games.short_description: Can your party lift the curse that has befallen the once peaceful Vale? An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 1-3, loosely based on Dungeons and Dragons Open Game License (OGL 1e/2e).

games.name: STAR-BOX: RPG Adventures in Space
games.short_description: STAR-BOX – RPG Adventures in Space!Strap on your gravity boots, power up your laser, and climb aboard your spaceship for a retro-styled, RPG-jaunt into the unknown!Travel an open-world, sandbox universe where you are the architect of your own story.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Space
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles 2: Space is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game in a universal style, each piece uniquely shaped like no physical puzzle could be.

games.name: Pixel Star
games.short_description: Endless arcade action takes a modern twist, creating a uniquely challenging open space shoot-em-up experience. From brutal bosses to black holes and beyond, countless hazards await discovery. How long can you survive?

games.name: A Nasty Farm
games.short_description: An 3d arcade game depicting the unclear situation of chicks trapped by Dr. Mazi, a mad, self-proclaimed scientist who has targeted little defenseless chicks.

games.name: NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD
games.short_description: NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD is a “multi-ending ADV” depicting daily life with “OMGkawaiiAngel”, a young girl with a rather extreme need for approval attempting to become the #1 “Internet Angel” (streamer).

games.name: Pixel Privateers
games.short_description: Pixel Privateers is a Squad Based Tactical RPG “Loot ‘Em Up” that will send your team of mercenaries through a mysterious wormhole on a quest to gather technology for your employer. An entire galaxy awaits - full of worlds to explore, factions to encounter, and epic gear to collect!

games.name: Demetrios - The BIG Cynical Adventure
games.short_description: The Journey of an Idiot. 8 to 12 hours of fun!

games.name: Zasa - An AI Story
games.short_description: Zasa is an extraordinary and challenging 3D Puzzle Game. Players are going to roleplay Zasa the Artificial Intelligence to finish the training missions from Dr.Mason by linking nodes in 3-dimensional space.

games.name: Gizmos: Interstellar Voyage
games.short_description: Space adventures are waiting for you!

games.name: Sophia the Traveler
games.short_description: Join our lovely heroine as she roams Venice, the City of Water. Like a Where's Wally Visual Novel: Search for objects & characters in stunning and vivid hand-painted cityscapes!

games.name: Golden Rails: Valuable Package
games.short_description: After losing some packages, postman Philip turns to his new friends, Jack and Jill, for help in delivering all the remaining packages to their rightful owners. But it's not just a simple delivery task; the bandits are willing to do whatever it takes to get their hands on the valuable packages.

games.name: Ben and Ed
games.short_description: Ben and Ed is a 3D platformer, in which the player controls Ed the Zombie, who is forced to participate in a grotesque game show called "Rundead". Will he beat all obstacles Hans Showmaster confronts him with, to save his best friend Ben?

games.name: Corrupted
games.short_description: Corrupted immerses players in a haunted mansion, providing a suspenseful exploration of its eerie past. Combining psychological and survival horror, the game offers a truly chilling experience with elements such as exploration, puzzle-solving, resource management, and combat.

games.name: Animated Puzzles
games.short_description: Animated Puzzles Star is a Jigsaw - style puzzle game with a fun and fascinating twist, animated pictures. A wonderful pastime, in which beautiful photos are combined with natural motions and effects, giving you a puzzle experience above the ordinary.

games.name: Crazy Pixel Streaker
games.short_description: A Fresh and Insane Brawler with Roguelike elements. Lead a fellowship of jackasses abducted by angry aliens and forced to spread chaos into the most famous sports events. Instant fun, Retro Arcade style, for up to 4 players.

games.name: Iniquity Survivors
games.short_description: Iniquity Survivors is a Coop Arena Roguelite, where you slay hordes of enemies either by yourself or with up to 3 friends or strangers online. Acquire new powers, create broken builds and use your spells wisely to survive and defeat the final boss at the end of each map!

games.name: Reprogram
games.short_description: Reprogram is a side scrolling tactical game where timing is as important as positioning. You control the characters by assigning commands that will be performed simultaneously during a turn. That way, you'll have to learn the enemy's behaviour and think ahead when creating a strategy.

games.name: StarsOne
games.short_description: You’ll see an unexplored world full of dangers, mysteries and adventures. You will explore randomly generated planets, develop industry, conduct trade, plant colonies, explore outer space.

games.name: Wrong Dimension - The One Dimensional Platformer
games.short_description: Platform and fight across a variety of levels through one dimension. What happens when you're given the familiar concepts of a 2D platformer, but seen from a different angle? Things change entirely.

games.name: POPixel
games.short_description: Hey, have you ever dreamed of being fired by a cannon as a bullet man? How about jumping on balloons popping them ?? You can do all this with POPixel. The game where you become one, jumping and popping balloons. Oh, and don't forget to collect the coins !!

games.name: Shout Of Survival
games.short_description: A multi-player SHOUTING (not Shooting) game where 2 monsters hunt down 2 humans that are trying to reunite.

games.name: Farmer And Tree
games.short_description: Adopt barren hills, plant trees, and experience the sweet joy of doing nothing!

games.name: Clausum
games.short_description: Immerse yourself in the bone-chilling world of Clausum. With no means to defend yourself, solve puzzles, explore and uncover the true horrors that lurk within the house. Will you survive, or succumb to the malevolent forces that await you? Face your fears in this immersive psychological horror game.

games.name: Warranted Humanity
games.short_description: Warranted Humanity is a post-apocalyptic 2D side scroller where choices matter. Fight different infected and rival factions, scavenge, skill up, craft, manage your shelter and other survivors, all in a race against time to ensure humanity’s survival before everyone is irreversibly infected.

games.name: Jurassic Survival
games.short_description: Jurassic Survival is an open-world survival game where players must cohabit with roaming dinosaurs.

games.name: Visceratum
games.short_description: Biohacker Krimson challenges Visceratum, a biological singularity brewing in the depths of the Soft City. How are the secrets of one's childhood, the rebellion of consciousness, and the plots of deranged corporations intertwined? You are here to unravel this mystery. Or forge a new one?

games.name: Muay Mayhem
games.short_description: Muay Mayhem is a fast-paced, stylized Muay Thai striking game blending deep tactical combat with bold comic art. Master fists, feet, knees, and elbows in quick matches, PvE and PvP battles, plus a story-driven campaign. Customize your fighter, climb tournaments, and sharpen striking skills!

games.name: 乐队经理2077
games.short_description: A cyberpunk-themed band management simulation game where you recruit musicians, plan tours, release albums, and lead your band to the top of Music City's entertainment industry.

games.name: Adventures of Chris
games.short_description: Embark on a global adventure in this ‘90s-inspired adventure platformer. Help a chubby underdog kid with wacky superpowers battle bizarre villains, unlock and customize special moves and spells, and save the world!

games.name: Making History: The Great War
games.short_description: The Great War is a turn-based grand strategy game based on the epic struggles of the WWI era. Experience the battles of attrition and punishing artillery barrages. Play as any nation of the period as the modern world of industrialized warfare replaces an age of kings with a struggle of ideologies.

games.name: Crimson Ranch
games.short_description: Classic 2D horror game about a lone roamer decides to retrieve a satanic book for mysterious Mr. Grey and face anthropomorphic demons in order to fulfill his childhood dream.

games.name: ASA: A Space Adventure - Remastered Edition
games.short_description: ASA: A Space Adventure is a first-person sci-fi adventure game reminiscent of games such as the famous Myst series. Visit a vast spaceship called The Ark, divided into 6 areas, and discover the truth behind the Cubes...

games.name: People of Mine
games.short_description: A psychological horror where you play as a former agent hunting a cult—only to uncover a disturbing truth about your identity, memories, and the monsters you thought you were fighting.

games.name: Treasure Adventure World
games.short_description: Set sail for adventure with a paper hat on your head and a magical shrinking boat in your pocket, in search of legendary treasures! Solve tricky puzzles, battle formidable foes, piece together clues and dig up secrets to uncover your own shrouded history as you explore this sprawling open world.

games.name: The Indie Mixtape
games.short_description: From laser-jousting deathmatches to bird-noir crime thrillers, The Indie Mixtape contains five of the most interesting and exciting games from the best indie talent out there.

games.name: Dead Containment
games.short_description: Dead Containment is an on-rails shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Players fend off the undead as they race through a city under siege, blasting away the horrors that roam the streets using a variety of weapons. Playable solo or online co-op.

games.name: イル・ドー
games.short_description: このゲームは、海洋交易で資金を稼ぐゲームで、交易、探険、戦闘の３つが重要となります。交易で銀貨を稼いで仲間を増やし、探険で手に入れた資材で強い船をつくり、戦闘に勝利しましょう。交易、探険、戦闘をどういうバランスで進めていくかは、プレイヤーの自由な攻略に委ねられています。ゲームの舞台となる海域には、ライバルの勢力がいて覇権を競い合っています。プレイヤーはストーリー中の分岐によって、勢力同士争いに介入することができ、その選択が味方になる勢力と敵になる勢力に影響を及ぼします。

games.name: Rynn's Adventure: Trouble in the Enchanted Forest
games.short_description: Rynn’s Adventure is a 2D platformer game in which the player guides Rynn through a variety of environments teeming with magic and danger. The player will help Rynn combat the many enemies she encounters and outwit each of their fearsome generals.

games.name: Find the Oil Racing Edition
games.short_description: Find the Oil Racing Edition is a racing game where you must to find the stolen oil with the help of different vehicles like super car, a 4x4 monster and a simple sedan. If you thought this mission will be easy, think again!

games.name: Polygon Survivors
games.short_description: Polygon Survivors is a 2D survivors-style roguelite where you fight off waves of enemies using customizable weapons, powerful abilities, summons, and a variety of projectiles. Experiment with endless synergies to survive the polygonal chaos.

games.name: Cloney
games.short_description: Cloney is a dragon looking for coins, all you need to do is tap your way through this endless runner collecting as many coins as you can without flying into anything. Sounds easy enough?

games.name: MAVR3D 八般武艺
games.short_description: Martial Arts VR 3D (Immersive Duel, Cultural Treasure Demonstration) MAJOR UPGRADE Boss TacticalSim. Inch-longer the stronger! Inch-shorter the deadlier! Duel your Foe (or friend), Arena players, or Boss femme fatales using different pairings of Eight Martial Arts. Real-Time Strategy Action Slasher
developers: Beijing Lanxii Play Technology Co., Ltd
publishers: Beijing Lanxii Play Technology Co., Ltd

games.name: n2222
games.short_description: Hello, gamer, This game is a decryption game,Collect scores. Solve the puzzle and pass the level,Don't touch the enemy, Otherwise, play this level again. Decryption game you have never played.

games.name: Porcelain Mask
games.short_description: Porcelain Mask - is a platformer where puzzles are combined with action, all for one purpose... to kill you. Everything in this world is reaching out to rip you to shreds just so you don't take the next step. After all, there may be something up ahead...

games.name: Her Story
games.short_description: A woman is interviewed seven times by the police. Search the video database and explore hundreds of authentic clips to discover her story in this groundbreaking and award winning narrative game.

games.name: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily
games.short_description: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily is a turn-based stratergy game. The villainess Scarlet, deceived and falsely accused of killing of the King, becomes the first streamer. Through this, she uses manipulates and diversion to rebel against the vast military force of the Imperial Kingdom.

games.name: Army of Pixels
games.short_description: Pixel strategy that combines real-time and turn-based gameplay. 17 factions from vampire queens to mechanical golems.

games.name: ProjectTeo
games.short_description: ProjectTeo is a platformer with moving between dangerous saws and collecting keys.

games.name: >//:System.Hack
games.short_description: >//:System.Hack is a sim-rpg set in a dystopian future. Take the role of a neophyte hacker as they begin their criminal career. Design programs, increase your skills, upgrade your hardware, hack systems in cyberspace, battle IC, rob banks, manage your own company and more!

games.name: PUMPKIN PANIC
games.short_description: COME TO THIS COZY FARM! Plant crops, take care of the plants, go fishing, or whatever you prefer, but have a good time! But be carefull, they say that strange things are happening in the area...

games.name: Judgment: Apocalypse Survival Simulation
games.short_description: Build, scavenge, craft, and perform occult rituals to survive in a demon-infested, post-apocalyptic colony simulation. Will you survive Judgment day?

games.name: Epic Snowday Adventure
games.short_description: The neighborhood kids must be neutralized. I'm sure its for their own good. Only you can restore order by DESTROYING YOUR NEIGHBORS WITH SNOWBALLS. They'll thank you for it later.

games.name: Rogunky
games.short_description: Descend into the unknown in this unique roguelike platformer! Brave a constantly shifting dungeon filled with deadly monsters, traps, and powerful relics. The deeper you go, the greater the challenge. Uncover secrets, explore diverse environments, and fight to discover what awaits at the bottom.

games.name: Josh Powlison's BUTTON: Mildly Remastered Edition
games.short_description: Press a button. Increment a number. Change reality. The instant classic returns for a mildly remastered electric boogaloo on modern computer systems. Once again experience the euphoria of button pressing with Josh Powlison's striking developer commentary to guide you.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles: UndeadZ
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles: UndeadZ is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game with top down shooter gameplay throw in to ruin your day and peaceful puzzling experience.

games.name: Retro City Rampage™ DX
games.short_description: OPEN-WORLD carjacking goes back to the '80s in this 8-BIT nostalgic throwback. Run missions! Outrun the law! Rampage the city with weapons, power-ups and vehicles!

games.name: Arcade games collection
games.short_description: The craziest, weirdest game in the universe,

games.name: Burgerwise the Clown
games.short_description: When Burgerwise finds his home broken into, his friends murdered, weird monsters roaming the halls, and his BURGERS taken, he does what any sensible puppy-smashing clown would; he takes advantage of the situation to kill the rest of his roommates. And take their stuff!

games.name: Airplane Mode
games.short_description: Airplane Mode delivers all the thrills of a real-time, six-hour commercial airline flight—in Coach. At least you've got a window seat. Buckle up.

games.name: Chains on Sand
games.short_description: Enter the blood-soaked arenas of Chains on Sand, a brutal turn-based roguelike where every strike counts. Build a unique gladiator, survive tactical grid-based combat, and rise through fame, death, and legacy — or die forgotten beneath the sand.

games.name: Lil' Horror Stories: The Camp Fire
games.short_description: You got a voucher for a free camping trip, sponsored by The Bank!! YAY!! Time to enjoy the nice outdoors... Good thing boogeymen and monsters don't exist... Heh... Do they?... Collect 12 logs to get through the night...Camp fires are safe... Crouch to be silent...Your Flashlight attracts them...

games.name: Spirit Fighters
games.short_description: Spirit Fighters is a casual fighting game with controls that are easy to use and various move combinations.

games.name: 返杀 Back Fire
games.short_description: 《Back Fire》is a full motion video gunfight action adventure game. In the game, players need to make their own choices, which will affect the progression of the plot. The final endings of the story will be different, and the secret hidden in the world of “Back Fire” will be revealed.

games.name: Idle Lab Rats
games.short_description: Train rats in a series of mazes and help them improve their stats. Submit rats for grant money and use it to upgrade your lab with new tools and buy new rats with powerful abilities! These new rats have such amazing potential. How smart are these rats becoming?

games.name: Adventurezator: When Pigs Fly
games.short_description: The Adventurezator is an emergent adventure game about creating emergent adventure games! When Pigs Fly is our adventure campaign of courage, intrigue, and betrayal (and dumbness) - created using the Adventurezator itself!

games.name: Hazel & The Deep
games.short_description: A Doxy certified classic returns! This original web game is now remastered in a new engine, fully voiced and animated to shine through its sexy glory!

games.name: Puzzle Box
games.short_description: Puzzle Box is painting with creative gameplay! Create fantastic pixel art images, by dropping your colour paint blocks in the correct place across the levels.

games.name: Fallen Castle
games.short_description: A real-time strategy, tower defense, and base-building game where physics based 2D blocks influence the course of grand battles and the construction of strategic fortresses.

games.name: Ducky Clicker Idle Game
games.short_description: Discover the universe of Ducky Clicker, an idle game full of unique rubber ducks. Click, expand your collection, and unlock divine powers, quantum ducks, and more. Rule the world of ducks as you ascend to infinity!

games.name: Gurumin: A Monstrous Adventure
games.short_description: Gurumin: A Monstrous Adventure is a cute and clever action RPG featuring real-time combat, 3D graphics, 90+ items, mini-games, multiple endings, a rocking soundtrack, 35+ hours of playtime, tons of fully voiced characters by an all-star cast of voice actors, and more!

games.name: Heathen - The sons of the law
games.short_description: Indie game inspired by the novel "The island of Doctor Moreau" by HG Wells.

games.name: Code 3: Police Response
games.short_description: Code 3 is a tactical police based first person shooter developed for the PC made by police and police support personnel.

games.name: Story Of the Survivor
games.short_description: Story of the Survivor is an action RPG that takes place during a zombie apocalypse. Surviving isn't going to be easy, and zombies aren't the only things to worry about. You must also eat and drink to survive as well as avoid other survivors.

games.name: Pixel Dungeon
games.short_description: Pixel Dungeon is an exciting and extremely popular roguelike (more than 2 million mobile installs!). Explore the depths of Pixel Dungeon, collect useful items and fight fierce monsters to find the Amulet of Yendor - the ultimate artefact of this game world!

games.name: Mimicry
games.short_description: A terrifying online horror game where one player becomes an impostor monster. Disguise, hunt, and destroy your friends — or work together to survive. Mimicry is a fast-paced, multiplayer fun game full of deception, fear, and chaos.

games.name: The Adventures of Rob-1E
games.short_description: Explore an open world full of puzzles and challenges as self-aware robot Rob-1E. Along the way, collect and upgrade cute companions, visit memorable locations, and unlock Rob-1E's true powers.

games.name: Go Alone
games.short_description: Go Alone is a pixel art soulslike metroidvania adventure with magical ranged spells and fast-paced combat.

games.name: Unbridled: Horse Designer
games.short_description: You have the power to craft your ideal equine companion from head to hoof. From choosing coat colors and intricate markings to styling majestic manes and tails, the Horse Designer offers a myriad of options to bring your unique vision to life.

games.name: EXOME
games.short_description: EXOME is a co-op survival shooter with a focus on exploration, weapon progression and horde AI. Discover what grim mysteries are hidden in this deep forest. Explore and fight for survival, alone or with your friends.

games.name: Evolution II: Fighting for Survival
games.short_description: Evolution II: Fighting for Survival is a real-time action life simulation game. Conquer a world of randomly generated, evolving species.

games.name: The Adventures of Mr. Bobley
games.short_description: The Adventures of Mr. Bobley is a 3d platformer adventure game featuring physics based puzzles and challenges that also require you to drive vehicles and operate heavy machinery. Set at a skyscraper construction site. The game is all about physics and interaction with the environment.

games.name: Shining Hero
games.short_description: Shining Hero is a turn-based strategy game blending Slay the Spire and Into the Breach. As the chosen hero, you'll battle the resurrected Dark Lord, using cards and strategic positioning to defeat enemies. Collect new cards, refine your deck, and grow stronger as you face ever-greater challenges.

games.name: Summoners Mist
games.short_description: Summon the enemies you kill to solve puzzles, including a horse, a tree, a miner and a dragon. Some areas are unreachable without the right summon so you must find out how to get one it to advance to the next area.

games.name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 2
games.short_description: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 2 is a horror-mystery adventure game where you must track down five missing teenagers in an abandoned apartment complex. There's something sinister awaiting you inside. Beware.

games.name: Jellyfish
games.short_description: A simulation game about the life story of a jellyfish. In this game, I will present the full life cycle of a jellyfish: from an egg to a hydra and finally, after a not very long journey it becomes an adult jellyfish. A work of interactive art to bring the most beautiful of sea creatures to your screen.

games.name: Pixel Piracy
games.short_description: Embark on an epic 2D pirate simulator RPG adventure, where you navigate both land and sea. Upgrade your ship, recruit and level up your crew, and uncover hidden treasures as you become a legendary pirate.

games.name: The Adventures of Fatman
games.short_description: You are Fatman - the heroic crime fighter for the city of Shadowlawn. It is up to you, then, to tear yourself away from food long enough to save the city from certain destruction...

games.name: Tank Brawl
games.short_description: The perfect game to play local co-op with your friends and partners with classic top-down game play and simple yet dynamic controls. It come with eye-candy 3D graphic modernization of the classic Battle City with tons of added features to give it more depth and visual appeal. Now with Level Editor!

games.name: Lobstpurr
games.short_description: This is a clicker game with the following features:UpgradesCustomizationsAnti-Auto ClickerPurr Pass

games.name: Steep Slopes
games.short_description: Steep Slopes is a snowboarding endless runner game!

games.name: Zumbido Seele
games.short_description: Indie arcade FPS singleplayer shooter where you fight against hordes of monsters and explore the map in search of equipment.

games.name: Deeproot Manor
games.short_description: Your younger brother, Richard, has gone missing. There are rumors about an abandoned manor, deep inside the woods. Believing that to be your brother's last destination before his disappearance, you sneak out of your home and step forth into the forest...

games.name: Element Runner
games.short_description: Across land, water and clouds! Element Runner is a fun, casual platformer where you can explore worlds filled with grass, water, fire, candy and electricity! Featuring over 8 worlds and 60 levels, this game is a relaxing, completionists dream. Your journey in Element Runner awaits!

games.name: Ironcast
games.short_description: Puzzlequest meets FTL in this Steampunk Victorian era roguelite.

games.name: ASLO
games.short_description: Step into the shoes of Aslo, an adventurer on a mission to save his family's beach from debt. Start by selling coconuts and build a thriving beach resort chain. Explore oceans and islands, uncover the mystery of a stolen royal crown, and enjoy a captivating mix of business strategy and adventure.

games.name: Ant Colony: Wild Forest
games.short_description: You play as an ant queen, growing an ant colony. Ants cannot be controlled directly. But you can spawn needed types of ants; upgrade them; make raids and most importantly - dig and build a dungeon! The goal of each location is to destroy all enemy bases. If the queen dies - the game ends.

games.name: Crystal Story II
games.short_description: Crystal Story II is a turn-based RPG that follows the story of a young Dragon on his quest to defeat an evil witch. He must seek allies to aid him on his journey and save the world from the oncoming invasion.

games.name: PERFECT ANGLE: The puzzle game based on optical illusions
games.short_description: Challenge your mind with puzzles based on optical illusions. Find the perfect angle by rotating the camera to clean up the chaos and find a shocking story fraught with twists.

games.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing III
games.short_description: Van Helsing, monster hunter will face the most difficult trials of his life as he is trying to destroy his nemesis. The civil war is over in Borgovia, but the future still looks grim. The city of weird science is in ruins and a strange cult prophesises the coming of the end times.

games.name: Inner Call
games.short_description: Inner Call is a 2D adventure game where you play as a wise orc and help the locals with their problems. For the last 20 years, the forests have been filled with various monsters, which are now aggravating the villagers.

games.name: Frostbite
games.short_description: You are being hunted by the Yeti. You must survive the cold of a dark, winter forest and keep the Yeti at bay by gathering wood to keep your fire from dying out.

games.name: Awaria
games.short_description: Awaria is a short game about working in haunted maintenance tunnels.

games.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
games.short_description: Embark on an adventure in a gothic-noir world, where mad science threatens the peace between monsters and mortals. The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut is definitive edition of the trilogy with six playable classes and a new endgame mode with a huge variety of open missions!

games.name: YinYang Street: Separate Ways
games.short_description: Street Li Fang Zhuan is a Chinese micro horror game set in 1980s China, combining the story of understanding puzzles and text adventures. In the game, the scroll scene that can be moved by four axes is applied to bring different game experience to the player.

games.name: Crazy Eyes
games.short_description: Brutally Difficult Score Attack Breakout/Pinball type videogame with Sensory Overloading Surreal Aesthetic and a Totally Awesome Soundtrack!

games.name: Danger is near
games.short_description: Dive into a captivating atmosphere with 'Danger is Near,' a session-based hardcore multiplayer first-person shooter that combines various genres including survival, weapon and combat simulation, RPG, and MMO.

games.name: Poltergeist: A Pixelated Horror
games.short_description: Have you ever wondered what it feels to be a ghostly being? Watch them run and scream, scaring them using your intelligence, wit, and with the use of powers like possessions, spectres, altering objects and more. Have fun and play with the occult... and become a Poltergeist!

games.name: Skyratz
games.short_description: Take to the air as one of six unique heroes and soar through Avion City as you perform tricky maneuvers, hunt for weapons and armor, and battle in the skies to claim your spot on the pecking order!

games.name: Stars of the Valkyrie
games.short_description: Endless runner action has never been more dynamic with a unique 3D movement system. Fly through the stars in this Neo-Arcade game as you dodge asteroids shoot down enemies ships and protect transport ships. When you have finished upload and compare your score against the best from around the world.

games.name: Jewel Match Atlantis Solitaire 2 - Collector's Edition
games.short_description: Return to the amazing undersea world of Atlantis Solitaire for a new adventure! Embark on a journey across 620 (!) oceanic levels and restore 10 magnificent seascapes. Unravel 24 solitaire variants and enjoy the all-new supersize and challenge levels.

games.name: The Sandbox Evolution - Craft a 2D Pixel Universe!
games.short_description: Use your godly powers to craft amazing pixel worlds or destroy the universe! Play with physics, over 200 elements and controllable heroes. Make your own games or levels, and then share your creations online. There are no limits to your creativity and imagination!

games.name: Pixel Puzzles: Japan
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles: Japan combines traditional jigsaw puzzle style gameplay with light video-game interactivity.

games.name: Rock Star Simulator
games.short_description: Taste the life of a famous musician, go on the live tour across the USA and have fun just like a real star - welcome to the rock and roll heaven!

games.name: Book of Beasts — The Collectible Card Game CCG
games.short_description: Book of Beasts is a strategic collectible card game, with cards representing the eponymous beasts, inspired by myths from around the world. In the game, two beast summoners compete against each other with their decks of cards and try to outwit each other.

games.name: Bleed
games.short_description: Wryn is a girl with a big arsenal and big dreams -- she wants to be the ultimate videogame hero! Help her take down the Greatest Heroes of All Time in an action-packed bid to claim the title for herself and show the world what a true hero looks like!

games.name: Robin's Island Adventure
games.short_description: The player finds himself on a desert island, where he meets the natives, carves a home, builds a ship and ultimately sails back home.

games.name: Dance With Memes
games.short_description: Dance With Memes is very simple arcade game. Play with your favorite Twitch emotes using music/videos from internet or your hard drive. Test your skill and compare it with other players. The key is precision - smashing buttons will get you nowhere. Game supports Steam Leaderboards for Youtube videos.

games.name: Pantomime
games.short_description: Pantomime is an immersive collection of interactive story-driven games designed to make learning English an epic adventure. Every choice you make deepens your language skills and unravels new paths in these captivating, dynamic worlds.

games.name: Penguin Slide
games.short_description: Penguin Slide is a fast paced, physics based, singleplayer obstacle course game with a focus on being fun.

games.name: PixelJunk™ Eden
games.short_description: Swing, climb, and jump your way through massive “gardens” of vibrant other-worldly plant-life in this truly organic platformer.

games.name: Mortal Squad: Portal to Hell
games.short_description: Control a squad of fearless soldiers with unique abilities to stop a mad scientist who is ready to open a portal for creatures from hell. A classical turn-based system and procedural generation of levels which would require various tactical decisions to beat the game.

games.name: Bubble Frog DX
games.short_description: Bubble Frog DX is a fun and challenging short Action Puzzle game where you take on the role of a Frog in a Bubble who's been tasked to save 160 Onigiri from all kinds of hazards across 50 levels and 4 colorful zones in this retro throwback title!

games.name: Dungeon Crawler Daniel
games.short_description: Daniel and a group of adventurers must complete the Ravana Dungeon to win the ultimate prize so he can buy his house back from his parents.

games.name: Dog Half Life
games.short_description: Dog Star, as a dog, struggles with different colleagues in a simple life. Experience happy events and pitfalls, growth, marriage, buying a house, being fired, etc. This is a single player adventure, turn based game that allows players to see life clearly.

games.name: Spiderbro
games.short_description: Help Spiderbro through a strange dystopia and overcome the shadow spider that is constantly hindering you. Collect items and solve puzzles and keep moving, don't let the shadow spider get the better of you.

games.name: Pandea Stones
games.short_description: In the game you play the Pandean hero, Tin, which has a mission to save his planet from alien threat. You will be facing many obstacles thru different environments, where you will meet angry robots and funny looking animals.

games.name: Cheat or Die
games.short_description: Cheat or Die is a small puzzle game where you have to manage a full class of teenagers. Help Mathilde successfully pass her exams by any means possible without getting caught by the angry Supervisor !

games.name: Tchin
games.short_description: Play a 3D Monster Taming Open World game ! Tame Tchins and use them for battle. Every Tchin is unique, they can have different colors,bones and brain. Raise your own custom army of tchins and conquer the world!

games.name: Holoception
games.short_description: HOLOCEPTION is a new type of hybrid VR game allowing you to incarnate a character in 3rd and 1st person view. Explore a cartoonish Universe where everything is fully physics-based and where you have a lot of control and freedom to move and fight!

games.name: Akinofa
games.short_description: Akinofa is an arcade shoot 'em up with Roguelite elements.

games.name: The Black Watchmen
games.short_description: Become a Secret Agent and investigate paranormal activities in this dark Lovecraftian universe. This Alternate Reality Game will have you explore complex puzzles in-game but also in real-life; interacting with real websites, companies, and NPCs that we created as part of our universe.

games.name: Black Cycle
games.short_description: Consumers have power. A short walking simulator game that makes you think a little about how we usually consume.

games.name: Arcane Depths
games.short_description: Arcane Depths is a 2D action roguelike dungeon crawler. Become a powerful sorcerer and dive into dangerous depths filled with enemies and treasures. Combine a multitude of spells and relics to annihilate your foes. Procedurally generated dungeons, intense combat, and powerful bosses awaits!

games.name: Machick 2
games.short_description: In this roguelike-survivor, the toads are back! The magic chicken is unleashing ancient powers to stop them. Craft custom wands, defeat enemies, collect XP, and upgrade spells in Machick 2. Get ready to out-magic the menace!

games.name: Broken Scary Skeleton
games.short_description: Broken Scary Skeleton is a rogue-like top-down shooter in which you are cursed with love. Fight and possess defeated enemies to change your character's abilities and use different types of weapons.

games.name: Rock-N-Rogue: A Boo Bunny Plague Adventure
games.short_description: Prepare for a dungeon crawl like you've never seen before. Choose from Bunny or one of his three inseparable pals, Gunny, Faye and Ganny, grab your instrument of choice, and battle your way to victory across nine hellish levels of undead creatures, demons and monsters. Level up your favorite character for more power than ever before!

games.name: Neon Tower Blast
games.short_description: 90-s styled retro FPS! Take your blaster and shoot out some angry robots in the Neon Tower!

games.name: Railbound
games.short_description: A relaxing puzzle game about fixing train connections and travelling the world - now with a level editor!

games.name: Onset
games.short_description: Onset is an open world Lua scripting sandbox without predefined goals. Choose from hundreds of Lua functions from our Developer Wiki to create your own scripts and gamemodes. Onset is a perfect starting point for beginners interested in learning how to program.

games.name: Bacteria Wars
games.short_description: A real-time strategy game in which you fight to secure the victory of your Bacteria over the Cell Defense Force and other enemy Bacteria in a world where your units are your only resource, and where your mobile base will not be enough to keep you alive.

games.name: Starshifter
games.short_description: Starshifter is a game about shapeshifting, desert animals, and finding your place.

games.name: Black Circle
games.short_description: Just click or tap at any screen position to shoot the dot, and don't touch the dots moving on the screen.The game has a total of 1200 levels.

games.name: The Worst Game Ever
games.short_description: Utilize just a grappling hook and wall jumping to adventure through a near-to-impossible parkour maze. With no checkpoints and lava floor, your every move counts because once you touch the lava, you restart at the beginning. Challenge yourself by making the game even worse with hardcore controls.

games.name: Far Star
games.short_description: Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

games.name: Season of 12 Colors
games.short_description: --The way it was, Just like it is now, On a bright, bright summer day. "That's a promise, right?" The girl in a white dress said. Sunny sky. A paper plane slid across it, riding on blue winds.

games.name: This Throne Is Mine - The Card Game
games.short_description: You play as King of Qin, the one ended the 500-year civil war on this land. Act like a King to manage your follower and the royal court and unite the country. Ready to defence your throne?

games.name: Smartphone Tycoon
games.short_description: «Smartphone Tycoon» — unique business simulator. Create your own company for the production of smartphones! Your main goal will be to achieve worldwide recognition and take the company to the temple of fame of the global market.

games.name: City: Battle Ground
games.short_description: A card strategy game inspired by the principles of Auto Chess and roguelike genres. Dive into a criminal beast-metropolis where cops, bikers, gangsters, zombies, and even superheroes battle for control of the streets. Build a crazy deck, combine faction abilities.

games.name: PUSSY 4
games.short_description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

games.name: Mortal Fight: Lethal Revenge

developers: Kanuni Games OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA Ticaret Limited Sirketi
publishers: Kanuni Games OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA Ticaret Limited Sirketi

games.name: 脳みそジャーニー
games.short_description: A boy, is killed by a killer but resurrected on Halloween. But his brain had been stolen. Confront traps and monsters. Interact with strange inhabitants, solve puzzles, and get your brain back. Dying Game & comical horror. death scene collection feature available. pixel-art exploration adventure.

games.name: Empyrion - Galactic Survival
games.short_description: Build and explore in a true space sandbox survival adventure. Construct mighty capital vessels, sprawling planetary settlements, and vast space stations in your galactic journey to discover the mysteries of Empyrion!

games.name: Hedgie Simulator
games.short_description: Trapped within the offices of a large hedge fund called Sipadel Finance. It's your job to take a sip and make the apes dip while playing this idle clicker game.

games.name: Fiz and the Rainbow Planet
games.short_description: The unique little dragons run around with three buttons. A pixel art style 2.5D action game that goes beyond dimention! Fiz and the Rainbow Planet" is a 2.5D dot-picture action game in which players switch characters in a resourceful manner as they progress.

games.name: Teeny Tiny Harbors
games.short_description: Chart courses to direct ships and juggle seafaring duties. Expand your tiny harbor whilst keeping everything under control—and pretend the chaos is all part of the plan.

games.name: Scrap Dealer Simulator
games.short_description: Start from scratch and rise with scrap, dig through trash, process junk, and grow your profits. Buy warehouses, machines, and vehicles to build your own recycling empire.

games.name: Splat Cat
games.short_description: Wielding only your paintbrush, traverse your way through this 2D platforming artistic landscape and fight your creative block!

games.name: Riddlord: The Consequence
games.short_description: To complete this game, you will need to mobilize your logic, spatial thinking, memory, observation, ingenuity, and assiduity. The fate of Jack Reed and his son is in your hands! No chance to fail!

games.name: Stay Still
games.short_description: Stay Still is a first-person horror adventure based on Vietnamese culture. The gameplay is focused on storytelling, puzzles and avoiding dangerous threats & spirits hunting you. Solve various puzzles, watch your surroundings, and of course survive.

games.name: Dancing Pandas
games.short_description: What do you get if you mix Zelda Breath of the Wild & Animal crossing: A chill, relaxing adventure game. Roam around different islands helping out the villagers and animals. Rescue the islands from catastrophes with different collected tools, trade resources for upgrades and solve quests.

games.name: Curious Expedition 2
games.short_description: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

games.name: POOBO
games.short_description: A fast-paced action roguelike where you play as a tiny and adorable poop fighting off bacteria. Upgrade your weapons and items to escape the toilet and claim victory!

games.name: Vainly
games.short_description: Vainly is a minimalist and story-driven platformer that subverts some of the common expectations from games by blending gameplay with the philosophy of Absurdism.

games.name: Magic Academy Estoria
games.short_description: It is the RPG which I made by oneself. Production is ten months at first during age 22 years old, a production period.

games.name: Deep Despair 3
games.short_description: Deep Despair 3 is an open-world survival action-adventure with RPG elements! Fight, survive, dig, build, explore vast worlds, engage in farming, breed animals, gather resources, and level up to the max!

games.name: Into the Wild
games.short_description: Into the Wild is a tense yet tranquil survival game where nature holds nothing back. Inspired by the Norwegian hinterlands, the haunting valley of Jegersdal offers a faithful survival experience. Witness the magnificent aurora and search for answers amid the ruins of yesterday.
