games.short_description: Created by solo developer Nikola Kostic - Traverse a haunting world set in 1939 Germany in search of a mysterious girl with rabbit ears. Utilize a little bunny in creative ways to solve puzzles. Levitate sheep, use them as torches or wolf bait and make your way through a dangerous land.

games.name: 卢沟桥事变
games.short_description: The game begins on July 7, 1937. You can choose either of the two major forces located in Nanjing and Yan'an at that time, or operate the regular army to fight frontally, or develop guerrillas to attack the enemy's rear and save the precarious country!

games.name: Time Up
games.short_description: Time Up is a fast paced action platformer, with each level only being 9 seconds. Sieze every opportunity, plan your route, Survive various deadly traps, and reach the finish line! This game combines a variety of classic platformer elements: The levels are carefully designed to make them harder, yet more enjoyable to give the player a...

games.name: Path of a Player
games.short_description: This Game is loosely based on Solo Leveling

games.name: Horror inside the forest
games.short_description: Plunge into the captivating realm of "Horror Inside the Forest," an exhilarating game that tests your bravery. Explore a mysterious forest, confront supernatural forces, uncover secrets, survive the darkness, and escape its shadowy embrace in this immersive horror experience.

games.name: Blade Bros IMPACT!
games.short_description: "Welcome to Blade Bros Impact!, a action rpg game with several essences from the classics rpg from 16 and 32 bits era!, enjoy dynamic battle, scary bosses, get more powerful by gain levels, get swords, rods, bows, axes and so forth!".

games.name: A Sexy Tour With : Carmen
games.short_description: Embark on a titillating journey through Spain with Carmen, your alluring tour guide. This adults-only "spot the differences" game challenges your keen eye while rewarding your success with seductive reveals.

games.name: BATTLE PART
games.short_description: 3D Vehicles Shooter focused on boss battles.

games.name: Drawngeon: Dungeons of Ink and Paper
games.short_description: Inkland - the hand-drawn unusual world. Reveal the secret of the Mysterious Tower in this old-school role-playing game with a first-person perspective, real-time combat and grid-based movement.

games.name: Refactoro: Chaotic Farm
games.short_description: Bring your robots to help overwhelmed farmers and ranchers restore order to their chaotic lands. Use your programming skills to code the robots to clean the farm from messy livestock, bring them to the pen, tend with their food, and get a share of the farm's profitability from the livestock product

games.name: Sneak Out
games.short_description: Sneak Out is a free to play multiplayer game full of mischief and fun for up to six players. Enter the Haunted Castle and prepare to hunt, hide, or prank 'em all, causing all kinds of hilarious mayhem while trying to win the deadly game of hide and seek!

games.name: Thrud - Valkyrie Rising
games.short_description: Face Ragnarök and rise against unending hordes in this relentless horde-survivor roguelite! Wield divine powers, collect ancient runes, and forge unstoppable synergies. Confront Loki’s trickery, crush monstrous bosses, and fight for the fate of Asgard.

games.name: SCS deORBIT
games.short_description: SCS deORBIT is a non-linear, non-combat first person game with heavy reliance on exploration, a slight horror vibe, permadeath, limited saves and some puzzles. You can play the original or the updated version.

games.name: Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland
games.short_description: Explore a dream world as the iconic Little Nemo, armed with toys, candy, and stuffed animals in this cute & colorful Metroidvania adventure. Experience NES-era platformer gameplay in a vast, non-linear world that has been hand-animated frame-by-frame, as you unlock new abilities to progress.

games.name: PetriDish.pw
games.short_description: It takes about 5 minutes to figure out the mechanics. Really relaxing, but dynamic gameplay awaits everyone from the first moments of the game. Control cell and eat the food. Become bigger and stronger. Get to fight other players, talk in chat, make friends and enemies.

Welcome to the year 2100. You have been selected to conduct research on the most advanced space station in all of the history of mankind with the most advanced AI. However, things start to take a turn for the worse when the AI begins to turn against you.

games.name: Hogen
games.short_description: Hogen is a digital card game drawing inspiration from Gwent and Magic: the Gathering. Place weapon, unit, and magical crystal shard cards to activate abilities and overpower your opponent.

games.name: Time Break
games.short_description: Set in an alternate reality, play as a cop using a powerful time slowing watch to stop crime and save the city.

games.name: Affair
games.short_description: Hentai game hacker simulator. Hack the accounts of 30+ beauties and get their naked photos!

games.name: Derpy God
games.short_description: Derpy God is a 2D side-scrolling real-time strategy game, with chaotic physics-driven battles, set in a fantasy world of gods and mortals. Gather resources, build defenses and send forth your armies in campaign mode, or get creative and craft crazy scenarios in the sandbox.

games.name: 浮游
games.short_description: 紧锁的木门，消失的同学，神秘的鬼怪。爸爸妈妈去哪里了？我为什么在流眼泪…在世纪初县城的家中探索并重拾回忆，拼凑出所有谜团的答案。

games.name: Ani-Chess
games.short_description: Join a delightful and leisurely turn-based game with adorable cartoon animals, embarking on a puzzle-filled adventure. Challenge opponents and progress on the game board. Form a formidable team and navigate through challenges together.

games.name: Dark Moonlight
games.short_description: Dark Moonlight is a survival horror game with an action set in the near future that allows the player to control the fate of Dave Kellerman who suffers from various fears and phobias. The game is inspired by a number of modern sci-fi series.

games.name: Poco In Dungeon
games.short_description: ​Let's get Poco-chan out of the fortress! ​This game is a TPS game. ​Use the actions of shooting, flying, swimming, and catch & down to get Poco-chan out of the fortress of the fantasy world.

games.name: W.O.L.F
games.short_description: Become Wolf, a research staff member, and get to the "place to return". This is an action game that can be played easily with only the mouse! Complete more than 50 highly challenging action scenes while repeatedly making mistakes!

games.name: Elemental Realms
games.short_description: Element Realm is a puzzle game with a magical adventure theme. The game tells the story of a wizard's adventure to the elemental world in order to protect the world. You play as a wizard, visit different worlds, use different magic to solve massive levels.

games.name: Archery RED
games.short_description: Dive into a futuristic world as an archer, aiming to hit targets and vanquish robotic foes. Experience advanced mechanics and realistic shooting in an engaging single-player campaign or endless mode. Ready for the challenge?

games.name: JetBall Arena
games.short_description: In this futuristic sports game you can use your jetpack to fly around and try to score points by scoring goals

games.name: miniStrike
games.short_description: A shoot’em up game with bite-size levels.

games.name: A Hand With Many Fingers
games.short_description: Unravel a real conspiracy from deep within the CIA’s archives. Search classified documents and follow new leads in this non-linear investigative thriller.

games.name: Paws & Effect: My Dogs Are Human!
games.short_description: A quirky, comedic visual novel where dogs transform into people and nonsense ensues! Your choices will teach them about the human condition, but beware: They're not the only ones listening. Mysteries and irreverence await you in Paws & Effect: My Dogs Are Human!

games.name: Guns and Rush
games.short_description: Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic wasteland in this intense horde combat shooter that combines roguelike and bullet-hell elements. Battle relentless waves of monstrous foes as you strive to survive and conquer challenging levels. In my game no vampire, survive 20 minutes!

games.name: Bananitro
games.short_description: Bananitro is a 2D game where you control Monkey on his bicycle, using Bananitro to perform maneuvers and conquer obstacle-filled tracks, with creativity as the key to success.

games.name: New Cycle
games.short_description: New Cycle is a city building game with focus on survival. After an apocalyptic series of solar flares, human society has been thrown into disarray. Establish a settlement and develop it all the way from humble beginnings to industrial metropolis.

games.name: Deer Journey
games.short_description: Deer Journey is a third person walking simulator game. Outcasted by the other deers, an albino fawn is forced to go deep into the forest to find a place to live. Join him on his journey through a world too big for which he may not be yet ready.

games.name: 7th Domain:Tree of Chaos Prologue
games.short_description: "7th Domain" is a horizontal version action game derived from Roguelike Metroidvania combined with treasure grinding gameplay. You will play a child of destiny who repairs the world and finds the truth of the broken world. You will grow in battle and challenge the unknown and hidden forces.

games.name: Vivere Memento
games.short_description: A city forgotten by everyone, two women trying to unravel its secrets, and a dismal silence of war. Is it possible to create without the hope of being heard? Is it possible to mourn for someone obliterated in memories? And what horrors are hidden in the shadows of forgotten town?

games.name: Fire escape drill
games.short_description: 火并不可怕，可怕的是我们不知道如何自救，所以当我们遇到火时，我们该如何自救和逃生呢?当火灾发生时。我们通常要了解和掌握最基本的逃生方法，以及一些熟悉的逃生路线。

games.name: Power Washer Hero
games.short_description: Use your power washer to move objects, put out fires, and clean grime away.

games.name: 人间 The Lost We Lost
games.short_description: 《人间》是一款现实主义视觉小说合集，讲述了在同一个夏天、同一个地方的三对不同的男女之间所发生的最为真实的故事。

games.name: Horror Office
games.short_description: As you open your eyes, it's already deep night, you find yourself waking up in the office due to overtime work. But tonight is different: strange sounds fill the air, and a knife-wielding rabbit is hunting you. Use anything you can find to escape, solve puzzles, and get out before it's too late.

games.name: GRAVEN The Purple Moon Prophecy
games.short_description: THE PROPHECY IS COMING! An invitation to research ancient menhirs sends you to Brittany to find these magnificent standing stones. But you quickly discover there is far more at stake than groundbreaking research. There is a prophecy.

games.name: A House of Many Doors
games.short_description: Explore the House, a parasite dimension that steals from other worlds, in a train that scuttles on mechanical legs.

games.name: Druid's Tale: Crystal Cave
games.short_description: RPG game with crafting elements. Become a Druid that is protecting your land from darkness. Make potions, poisons and even alcohol. Trade your products with neutral factions and fight the forces of evil. The game emphasizes new solutions that have not been applied anywhere else!

games.name: Happy Door
games.short_description: An online cooperative horror game featuring magicians, playable by up to 4 players. Use light to fend off creatures before they spawn, and safely retrieve items.

games.name: Area-X
games.short_description: is a blend between Visual Novel and Adventure Game. Follow the story of Elcia as she time travels and solves the mysteries of her surroundings.

games.name: Pellet Dodge
games.short_description: Save your friend from being used as a fuel source to corrupt the Universe.

games.name: Resilience
games.short_description: Come face to face with the dangers that await your crew on a distant planet with extreme temperature conditions. Gather resources, explore, defend against aggressive flora and fauna, develop technologies to survive and leave the planet.

games.name: Codemakers!
games.short_description: Why are you here? what is going on? how did this happen? all will be answered in due time. until then, you must rebuild what is left of this universe, by harvesting code from the simulator and saving people and places. will you rebuild, or will you fall just like the last iteration?

games.name: Pixel Survivors
games.short_description: Pixel Survivors is a god management game. Create some land and build structures to keep your small society settled. See how long you can keep your village alive!

games.name: Time Agent
games.short_description: Use your time power and avoid bullets successfully.

games.name: The Dream Globe
games.short_description: Idler game inside an antique dream globe, help the boy in the dream world mine beautiful gems and build his home.

games.name: Ball Animals
games.short_description: Animal Ball is a local party game, where 2 to 4 animal balls fight against each other...Use your bouncy belly to bounce others away!

games.name: Meowstery of a Growing Aurora
games.short_description: 'Meowstery of a Growing Aurora' is a 2D pixel-art adventure set within the fictional VR-MMORPG Shenanghia, where you step into the shoes of Eleanor, as she has to save her pet cat Aurora from danger lurking within the game.

games.name: Jenny LeClue - Detectivu
games.short_description: JENNY LECLUE is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character, featuring dozens of characters to meet, mysteries and puzzles to solve across a vibrant, atmospheric world.

games.name: Salvo Subs
games.short_description: Destroy your friends online in Salvo Subs, a retro inspired top-down shooter. Unlock 32 submarine vessels in 10+ arena game modes.

games.name: Eternal King
games.short_description: Eternal King is a wave-based hack 'n' slash with deep, involved combat. Hone your skills against unrelenting hordes of monsters in a surreal fantasy world.

games.name: Kith - Tales from the Fractured Plateaus
games.short_description: Kith is free regular mini-adventure series, set on a planet covered in fractured plateaus above a dark and ominous mist.

games.name: Idle Nine Heavens
games.short_description: A place to repair fairy game, can hang up can be manual, free combination of spells, get to know the Tao partner to enhance the strength of the realm.

games.name: Defense Technica
games.short_description: Defense Technica is the next evolution in hardcore tower defense strategy games. Protect the core from an onslaught of unrelenting biomechanical terrors with a powerful range of tower defense units – each with their own upgradable features and methods of attacks.

games.name: The shelter of patient
games.short_description: This game is a 3D based simulation horror game and has a high graphic level. Help the protagonist, a journalist, explore a mysterious mansion in the mountains. Of course you shouldn't die.

games.name: Eternal Evil
games.short_description: A small town is being taken over by ghouls. Solve puzzles, carefully read notes and use various weapons against horrific and evolving enemies to uncover what is behind this gruesome event. Eternal Evil is an old-school survival-horror game.

games.name: Get Over Here!
games.short_description: It's a krazy fusion of Mortal Kombat + Flappy Bird. Impale enemies while dodging deadly flying saws. Disintegrate the queued up enemies with the flying saws, but doing so requires great precision and courage. Absorb enough blood to engage Fatal Drive mode and destroy everything.

games.name: Wildlife Park 2 - Horses
games.short_description: Horsesimulation with 16 breeds of horses and varied missions.

games.name: Ballistic Machines
games.short_description: Build the world as you move, fight monsters and defeat your friends.

games.name: The Huntsman: Winter's Curse
games.short_description: The Huntsman: Winter’s Curse is a narrative-driven, interactive fantasy fiction game with a card based combat system set in the universe of Snow White and the Huntsman.

games.name: KEL Reaper of Entropy
games.short_description: Remember all those games in which you start in a village and you have to prove your worth by clearing the local crypt of undead skeletons? What if you woke up as one of those skeletons instead of the wannabe hero?

games.name: Binary Golf
games.short_description: Mini-golf with a chaotic twist! Chain abilities, curve shots, and eliminate targets until the last one becomes the cup. Customize your ball, master wild power-ups, and compete in the madness of Battle Mode or uncover the secrets of Story Mode!

games.name: The Backrooms: You've Been Here Before
games.short_description: You find yourself in Backrooms, and it's up to you to find a way out of this place. You are completely lost, in a world of endless corridors and liminal spaces. And no one knows what's waiting for you around the next corner.

games.name: Yard Sale
games.short_description: Yard Sale is a charming hidden object game where you assist a family in organizing a yard sale to fund their dream trip to Paris, while also uncovering buried treasures and reliving precious family memories.

games.name: Hush
games.short_description: Surrounded by blood freezing phobias intent on absorbing her into oblivion

games.name: Betelgeuse
games.short_description: Betelgeuse is a mind-bending puzzle game where simple rules create complicated puzzles. At the beginning it should be easy for everyone, but later on it's getting really challenging. It consists of six chapters where rules are completely different.

games.name: Cosplay Maker
games.short_description: A cosplay management and dating simulation.

games.name: ADRIFT
games.short_description: Drift away in the serenity of the desert. Carry your fragile cargo across a top-down world, and discover fragments from a time before. Untwine labyrinthian roads, where sweeping dunes make way for twisting canyons, and find oases in which to plan. Where will your journey take you?

games.name: Wizards
games.short_description: Artillery tactics games are back! Grab some friends and get ready for an all out Wizard war! Create your own way of play with tons of unique spells to choose from. With randomly generated terrain and unlimited combinations, you'll never know what will happen next. Completely free to play.

games.name: Lulu Way
games.short_description: Lulu the little astronaut is trapped in space. Help Lulu escape eternal limbo by jumping from one block to another, solving uniquely crafted puzzles is the only way!

games.name: Genopanic: Prologue
games.short_description: Enter 'Genopanic: Prologue,' the beginning of a dynamic story in a Metroidvania-style experience! Wield a plasma cutter, team up with your virtual dog LAIK, outsmart the cunning cat-girl AI VOLGA, uncover the secrets of Dark Matter, and delve into DNA experiments in a galactic adventure.

games.name: วีรบุรุษไร้พลัง ไข่ต้ม
games.short_description: เกมผจญภัย rpg ระบบ Turn-based ผู้เล่นจะได้รับบทบาทเป็น 'ผู้กล้า' ที่ถูกอัญเชิญไปยังต่างโลก เป้าหมายของ 'พระราชา' ผู้ซึ่งอัญเชิญมีเพียงอย่างเดียวคือ ให้ช่วยกำจัดภัยร้ายในดันเจี้ยน ผู้กล้าต้องฝ่าฟันอุปสรรคต่าง ๆ สำรวจพื้นที่อันตราย สะสมประสบการณ์ หาแรร์ไอเทม เพื่อพิชิต 'ราชาอสูร' ลงให้ได้

games.name: Galaxy Trucker: Extended Edition
games.short_description: Sign up to be a galaxy trucker today! An adaptation of Vlaada Chvátil’s award-winning board game is now on Steam. Already includes the ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES expansion!

games.name: Monospaced Lovers
games.short_description: Monospaced Lovers is an exploration-driven platformer about closeness and distance. Journey through a metafictional, fantasy-filled land and find the truth of your fragile world before it disintegrates.

games.name: Falling Bullets
games.short_description: Start your adventure in the tank, which you can defeat tens, hundreds and even thousands of players. The gameplay focuses on rivalry in armored battles between players from around the world in PvP interactions. Falling Bullets are preserved in a cartoon and friendly atmosphere.

games.name: Kori's Fable Visual Novel
games.short_description: In a world of twisted magic and broken spirits be a girl with a mission.

games.name: ROM: Extraction
games.short_description: ROM: Extraction puts you into the role of an Extractor where you must Throw, Slow, & Shoot your way to decimate as many extraterrestrial-bots as possible. ROM: Extraction begins as an homage to the classic arcade shooter with more game modes and maps to come!

games.name: Three Finger Battle Arena
games.short_description: Three Finger Battle Arena is a game where you can punch your friends into orbit, then swing away like nothing ever happened!

games.name: Zengeon
games.short_description: Zengeon is an anime infused Action RPG and Roguelite with a selection of unique characters and varying play-styles. Slaughter your way through demonic hordes and colossal bosses with hundreds of combination and skill possibilities!

games.name: Space Chaos
games.short_description: Hop aboard your intergalactic package relay station for a totally bonkers adventure with your friends! Receive, handle, and forward unpredictable cargo from across the galaxy — from live llamas to unstable black hole matter.

games.name: Cyborg Invasion Shooter 3: Savior Of The World
games.short_description: Cyborg Trilogy last part. Cyborg has got new human transform. Kill different enemies, run and try to find teleport to other levels and save the world.

games.name: Pulut Adventure
games.short_description: Pulut Adventure is a 2D platform game with over 30 different stylistic levels and exciting mechanics. Defeat the enemy and collect different of weapon to advance your abilities. You can use the summon skills and flying mode to explore the world.

games.name: Backrooms: The Others
games.short_description: Backrooms: The Others is a cooperative horror game for up to 4 players where you will be forced to explore these unknown nooks and crannies, trying to survive in this complex world where death can be waiting for you at every turn!

games.name: Worldseekers - Deckbuilding RPG
games.short_description: A GPS role-playing game with narrative, deck-building, and mysterious arcana.

games.name: Spectacle: Worlds Unseen
games.short_description: Change your surroundings in the blink of an eye. Wield powerful glasses that let you see and interact with the world in new ways. Spectacle is a surreal first-person puzzle game about observation, spatial reasoning, and lizards.

games.name: Ancient Planet Tower Defense
games.short_description: Ancient Planet is classic tower defense game. The stronghold of an ancient civilization has been invaded by hordes of alien raiders. Use powerful technologies of the Ancient and repel the attack of the enemy's armies!

games.name: 告死天使的审判 Death Angel Trial
games.short_description: This is a game about online violence, all of which are based on the personal experience of the producer and shared with netizens. As far as possible to reduce the reality of one after another bloody cruel phenomenon. Today's victims may only be a little-known person, and the next It could be you.

games.name: Waking Nitemare
games.short_description: Waking Nitemare: A newtro FPS with modern twists. Dash, heal with melee headshots, use bullet time. Face unique bosses, find upgrades. Classic shooter action meets innovative mechanics. For retro fans and newcomers alike.

games.name: Shoot 'm Up
games.short_description: Tactical multiplayer chaos.That's what would describe this game in 3 words. It's fast, it's messy, it's challenging. Do you like blowing up zombies to bits together with your friends? Protecting your base from the enemy team? Grab your gear and start the chaos!

games.name: Reflection
games.short_description: Reflection is a Chinese VR puzzle game. The puzzle is innovative and unique. Players will challenge a multi-dimensional space created by the mirror, and use mirrors to solve puzzles by manipulating the world in mirror and enter it. Puzzles including Logic, Physics, Space, Time and so on.

games.name: Raiders of the North Sea
games.short_description: It's Raiding Season! Plunder your way to Viking adventure in the digital adaptation of the award-winning worker-placement board game!

games.name: Janky Tanks
games.short_description: Janky Tanks is a local multiplayer combat game for 1-8 players. It features hilarious physics and rapid "janky" combat. Seriously, your tank winds up spending most of its time in the air, using wall jumps and rocket jumps to fight. It's fun for the whole family. Try it. You won't be disappoint.

games.name: Hidden Paws Mystery
games.short_description: What is this cat doing here? And where are his friends? Explore strange and beautiful islands to find all the little kittens hidden there.

games.name: Unearth
games.short_description: Dig for the bones of your creators in this mashup of Bomberman, Digdug, and Lemmings.

games.name: ClickBit
games.short_description: ClickBit - clicker game performed in IT style, the main target of which is the gradual development. Also, the game has an upgrades that will help you speed up the gameplay.

games.name: Hexeract
games.short_description: Roguelike deck-building game on hexagonal tiles. Enjoy a dopamine-boosting experience by maximizing the synergy of your deck and tiles.

games.name: Survivalist
games.short_description: It's one year after the collapse of civilization and self-centered hedge fund manager Joe Wheeler emerges from his specially constructed bunker in search of food. This is a huge open-world RPG where you have the freedom to play how you want - but your choices have consequences.

games.name: 诡事其一珍珠剧院
games.short_description: You will play a boy who lives with his childhood sweetheart and is preparing for the law test, but is involved in a strange incident because of a prank of his childhood sweetheart who travels for work.

games.name: Serafina and the Key to the Egg
games.short_description: After receiving a challenge which could determine the future of her village, if not the whole world, Serafina sets out for the city of Mirado. There she will have to do anything she can to take part in auction to win treasure of great power, the Key to the Egg.

games.name: Witch and Lilies
games.short_description: Witch and Lilies is a 3D dungeon-crawling RPG where you foster romantic relationships between girls. Form a party of five girls from ten unique classes to navigate dangerous dungeons - all the while managing the relationships between them!

games.name: BuzzLabs
games.short_description: BuzzLabs is a competitive multiplayer aviation shooter with the cutest and buzziest drones ever! Pick your favorite insect or configure a little mutant from dozens of parts.

games.name: Paralax Vr Aim Trainer
games.short_description: Paralax Vr Aim Trainer is a program designed to help you achieve the best performance in a wide variety of VR games though structured scenarios focusing of the core aspects of aim development (Aiming, Flicking, Tracking and Reaction time) with data to track and support progression

games.name: The Last Shores
games.short_description: 🌿 The Last Shores is a chill solar-punk adventure. Clean, explore, and uncover the secrets of a forgotten island while restoring its lost harmony. 🏝️✨

games.name: Turbo Lizard
games.short_description: Go Fast! Be Rad! Turbo Lizard is a very silly 3d platforming game with inspirations from Sonic, Goat Simulator and Skateboarding games.

games.name: Renaissance Kingdom Wars
games.short_description: The year is 1510. As wars rage across Europe, Africa, and the Middle East, it is the age of gunpowder and mercenaries - that changed the course of history. You can do it as well, going from a leader of men to the ruler of an empire in this unique mix of RTS and grand strategy.

games.name: the jester's revenge
games.short_description: Discover a humorous, supernatural adventure with a jester's ghost seeking revenge on the king. Use spectral powers to haunt and vex in a kingdom blending comedy with gothic horror. Become the master of spectral pranks in this unique, ghostly rebellion.

games.name: Sunstone War
games.short_description: Sunstone War is a unique Action game with Tower Defense element where you can carry EVERYTHING! Move towers, toss away enemies, carry obstacles, upgrade skills and journey through lands to protect your village from calamity!

games.name: Trigger Witch
games.short_description: Trigger Witch is a 2D, twin-stick, action/adventure game set in an odd open world where magic is mundane, but firearms are the new unknown! You are Colette, and as you graduate from the Stock, a curious man invades your world... Welcome to the world of Witchcraft and Triggery!

games.name: Motherless - Season 1
games.short_description: Motherless is a captivating story-driven visual novel designed for mature audiences. Follow Sunny's journey, who was separated from his mother at birth, leaving him with scant knowledge of his past. Join him as he embarks on a quest to reunite with his long-lost mother and be richly rewarded.

games.name: Project Noah
games.short_description: Welcom aboard! You're now the crew of Revision, global leading company of space exploration. Operate Project Noah. Follow the manual. The destiny of space explorer dog Noah is on your hand.

games.name: Citadale Resurrection
games.short_description: A collection of old-school retro Citadale games in the style of various systems released in the mid 1980s to early 1990s. Each game has its own unique look, sound, gameplay style and feel and yet they are all distinctly Citadale.

games.name: Blastboard
games.short_description: Billiards-like puzzle game.

games.name: Exo Helljumper: Descent X
games.short_description: Enter the chaotic world of Exo Helljumper: Descent X, filled with mutated foes and lurking dangers. Combine items and strategy to conquer relentless levels. Face unique foes and formidable bosses, test your cunning and skills, and feel the thrill of battle as you push beyond your limits!

games.name: Gunpowder Cocktail - Chapter 1
games.short_description: Gunpowder Cocktail is a choice-driven adult game, combined with dark humor. It's a story about a young man who will experience major changes in his life after meeting a mob boss. Help him to find his path. Lots of sexy girls and... maybe a few villains are waiting for you!

games.name: Lost and Found Co.
games.short_description: Lost and Found Co. is a hidden object adventure in a cozy and immersive world. Join a cast of quirky characters on their epic journey across countless magical locations. Find lost items, solve puzzles, and help a tiny dragon regain her power!

games.name: Escape2088
games.short_description: Escape2088 is an old-school escape room game set in a futuristic, cyberpunk world.

games.name: Playing History - The Plague
games.short_description: Go on an exciting journey in the 14th century of Florence, an amazing city struck by a mysterious disease. The story is brimming with fascinating characters, historical events and captivating locations. History is yours to explore.

games.name: Lake of Shadows
games.short_description: A 2D pixel art side-scrolling resource management with some action, looting, and a bit of exploration that mainly focuses on a small area. Defend yourself against the terror of the night inside your settlement by employing some villagers and give them equipment to further strengthen your defenses.

games.name: Symphonic Mayhem
games.short_description: A multiplayer death match with tanks. Choose the best upgrades and attempt to destroy your enemies. Can YOU survive?

games.name: Hentai MineSweeper
games.short_description: This is a very conscience strategy game

games.name: Momento Pole
games.short_description: Swing through the battlefield with unparalleled speed! Build your talisman deck, harness the power of Yokai Cores to unleash devastating attacks, and explore powerful skill combinations. Chain momentum-based combos, master unique synergies, and defy gravity in this fast-paced roguelite action game!

games.name: Taxi Driver Life VR
games.short_description: Experience the thrill of real taxi driving in Taxi Life! Navigate through city streets, encounter diverse customers and tackle various tasks as you manage your taxi.With realistic graphics, dynamic weather and detailed vehicle controls, immerse yourself in the world of taxi driving like never before

games.name: What's Left
games.short_description: What's Left is a retro styled action, adventure game with exploration, combat, intense set pieces, and a rich story focused cinematic experience.

games.name: Beetle Barrage
games.short_description: Destroy all of the insects in your way! As you shoot, you recoil backward from your weapons as a mechanical beetle.

games.name: Mystic Mischief
games.short_description: Fly as Mammon the chaotic thieving bird as he attempts to achieve the biggest heist of his life. Poop, caw, and steal your way through his adventures. Avoid the dangerous dragons as they try to keep you from stealing their treasures.

games.name: Epistory - Typing Chronicles
games.short_description: Epistory immerses you in an atmospheric action/adventure game where you play a girl riding a giant fox who fights an insectile corruption from an origami world. As you progress and explore this world, the story literally unfolds and the mysteries of the magic power of the words are revealed.

games.name: Hospital hospitality
games.short_description: "Hospital Hospitality" is a 3D adventure "find and click" game. Search for items, bring them into designated area. In a world engulfed in chaos and destruction, you find yourself at the center of an exciting adventure with "Hospital Hospitality."

games.name: Cube Miners
games.short_description: Kill enemies while trying to earn cash!

games.name: Project Human
games.short_description: Experience extreme human tests in a human research center where artificial intelligence control everything. Make your way through different puzzles and platforming. On top of that things aren't as they seem to and so you'll encounter the most obscure things you have never even imagined.

games.name: Bad Apples
games.short_description: Bad Apples is an online multiplayer survival action game featuring fruits that ripen as they ripen over time. Change your or your opponent's stats according to the degree of ripening (if the fruit ripens too much, it rots) and use weapons and special moves to win the battle!

games.name: Sagebrush
games.short_description: A first-person narrative adventure game about exploring a cult compound in the remote New Mexico desert. Discover the lives of the former inhabitants -- what brought them together, what they believed, and why they ended it all.

games.name: Meta Visual Art
games.short_description: The Meta-Visual exhibition provides a unique perspective on the future of art. This special exhibition combines virtual installations and interactive experiences, offering art enthusiasts an unforgettable exploration opportunity in the VR environment.

games.name: The Banner Saga
games.short_description: Live through an epic role-playing Viking saga where your strategic choices directly affect your personal journey. Make allies as you travel with your caravan across this stunning yet harsh landscape. Carefully choose those who will help fight a new threat that jeopardizes an entire civilization.

games.name: Web Spice Purple World
games.short_description: The planet's been attacked again, you're using memes again, winning and all that, yay. Become a master in the fight against evil, use all your Arsenal, and show that your home planet is worth it to protect it.

games.name: Super Chick
games.short_description: Introducing Super Chick, a captivating rage-platformer wrapped in an irresistibly cute aesthetic. Engage in solo or online multiplayer modes, where you can compete or playfully sabotage each other. Get ready to jump, dodge, and smile your way through Super Chick – where the only way is up!

games.name: Magicmaker
games.short_description: Ever wanted to shoot poisonous lightning lasers? Freezing fireballs? Turrets that fire waves of miniature suns? How about lasers that shoot exploding black holes that suck out your enemies' life force? You can do that all in Magicmaker, the spellcrafting-focused platformer dungeon-crawler!

games.name: Dark Shores
games.short_description: Explore and survive in Dark Shores, an experimental survival horror game that explores concepts of perma-death, branching storylines, and unscripted fear. A luxury cruise containing five young tourists crashes on a remote island, deep within the South Pacific.

games.name: CLOSER - anagnorisis
games.short_description: CLOSER - anagnorisis is a game with distinctive art and gameplay. It contains a lot of creative designs. Here you will feel the spiritual experience.

games.name: AWAKEN - Astral Blade
games.short_description: Weave your own story in this dark fairy tale. In the mysterious ancient ruins, you will adventure with Tania to reveal her origins and fate. Is there any chance of survival in the darkest and desperate place?

games.name: Guardians of Lodino Forest
games.short_description: This is "Guardians Of Lodino Forest" (G.O.L.F. for short); a surreal need to play experience, an amazing hybrid sports action-adventure rhythm game about shooting an Armored series of giant golf ball boss Guardians into submission and then striking them back into their lair for a hole in one!

games.name: Midnight Ramen
games.short_description: In Midnight Ramen, you play as the owner of a late-night ramen stand and his apprentice. You interact with your customers, listen to their troubles, and help them out whenever you can. But as the bowls of ramen are cooked and served, troubles are beginning to brew in your own life as well...

games.name: PAKO - Car Chase Simulator
games.short_description: Tough as nails arcade driving game where you try to survive as long as possible without crashing your car in a police chase situation.

games.name: Emurinoo
games.short_description: Control the legs of an Emu (or is it an Ostrich?), traverse across tricky environmental challenges, and most importantly, don't give up!

games.name: Level 22: Gary’s Misadventures - 2016 Edition
games.short_description: The first stealth game set in the merciless and frenetic world of work!

games.name: Duel to The Holes
games.short_description: Welcome to The Hole, where the only thing bigger than the trouble is... well, let's just say the locals have a few extra tricks up their sleeves - and their pants.

games.name: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains
games.short_description: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains is a JRPG-styled game which focuses on story-telling, exploration and turn-based battling. Each main character has its own mysterious story. Furthermore, the game has a unique atmosphere which absolutely makes it a different experience in comparison to other JRPG games.

games.name: Reflection: The Greed
games.short_description: What's the worst that can happen from reading a decrepit book? Jon Oz, who's been sifting through pages of a book that shouldn't even have its cover opened, is about to confine himself into a nightmare. Will you end the nightmare when darkness falls? Or will you be a prisoner to your own reflection?

games.name: Sonucido: The Mage - A Dungeon Crawler by Daniel da Silva
games.short_description: Sonucido: The Mage is a grid-based, turn-based Dungeon Crawler RPG. Find the mage in the depths of Sonucido!

games.name: 麻神消消乐
games.short_description: This is an casual and exciting game in an unique way of the mahjong wining pleasure.

games.name: Bichito Clicker
games.short_description: Clicker / Idle style game where you must use your skill and abilities by clicking on the Bichos on your screen to defeat them and thus obtain points to improve yourself and face other stronger Bichos.

games.name: RefleXion
games.short_description: Un emocionante juego de rompecabezas y misterio en el que deberás escapar de la habitación en la que estás atrapado. Haz un trato con la muerte, investiga sus oscuros secretos, y a base de ingenio, consigue una segunda oportunidad o perece en el intento.

games.name: Domination - War of Nations
games.short_description: This is an online turn-based board game in which each player will need to eliminate their opponents in order to conquer territories and clear the way to win the game.

games.name: Yet Another World
games.short_description: Yet Another World - funny hardcore platformer in minimal style and relaxing ambient music.

games.name: Spyeye
games.short_description: The ideal corporate city has fallen after a global data breach. The terrible secrets of its citizens became known to everyone. Lives were ruined. You must return peace to this city: make the criminals answer for their actions and, perhaps, find out the cause of the global failure.

games.name: Divine Wish
games.short_description: Divine Wish is a fast-paced roguelike shooter with various classes and special abilities. Find your play style, survive waves of enemies, and use artifacts to change the tides of the battle. Die, learn, adapt!

games.name: SHADOBLITZ
games.short_description: Absorb enemies and build your own deck! This fast-paced action roguelike with deckbuilding elements lets you create millions of skill and passive combinations for a truly one-of-a-kind experience.

games.name: Cortex
games.short_description: Cortex is a little puzzle game containing over 200 levels!

games.name: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator
games.short_description: Manage a prosperous car shop empire and enter the complex car maintenance and repair world. This simulation game offers a comprehensive, in-depth experience that combines strategic business management with the technical nuances of car maintenance.

games.name: Station 0 - المحطة 0
games.short_description: Deep beneath Riyadh lies a forgotten metro station hiding terrifying anomalies. Explore, document, and survive a psychological horror experience that blurs the line between reality and illusion. Welcome to Station 0.

games.name: Game of Drones
games.short_description: Football and drones collide in GAME OF DRONES. It is a minimalist mini multiplayer game with a reduced, futuristic look.

games.name: The Revenge of Sophia Red
games.short_description: The Revenge Of Sophia Red is a first-person psychological horror adventure with puzzle elements. It's about the life of the book author Sophia Red. Love can turn into hate and make people blind. Revenge has become the only meaning in Sophia's life. This is her story.

games.name: Jasper Redds vs The Ares Belt
games.short_description: Experience intense, fast-paced action as you dodge enemy fire, collect Xsteel scrap, and upgrade powerful ship systems. Navigate across beautiful expanses of the galaxy in levels filled with challenging foes and epic boss battles.

games.name: Handsome Mr. Frog
games.short_description: Jump, lick, and spit your way through four worlds in a new-school arcade adventure starring the nominal Handsome Mr. Frog, a good looking fellow whose hat was jacked by a bunch of unattractive normies.

games.name: Endless Chaos: Hordes of the Afterlife
games.short_description: Hack and slash your way through thousands of enemies in this action-packed casual game with rougelike features. Level up and gain access to a variety of abilities that will either increase your chances of surviving or get you killed even quicker.

games.name: Furballer
games.short_description: Furballer is an arcade game where you take on the role of a puppet football player. Navigate the stage, kicking the ball into the enemy puppets to rack up points and secure the best show. The public will rate your performance live so be sharp, don't miss and keep on kicking ass... or heads !

games.name: Daka Dara
games.short_description: Out-position your friends in this two player strategy board game. The first ever digital version of the centuries old board game, Dara.

games.name: Heroes of Arca
games.short_description: Heroes of Arca is a unique blend of a turn-based strategy and RPG with an unorthodox combat system that presents a wide choice of battle tactics for the turn-based games' fans.

games.name: Sand in a Box
games.short_description: Sand in a Box is a 'falling sand' game that simulates thermal flow, electricity, radioactive decay, and gravity. Create art, experiment with physics, and craft your own simulation rules with user-friendly mod support!

games.name: RealmScape
games.short_description: RealmScape: Escape room adventure blending ancient mysteries with futuristic puzzles. Solve cryptic clues, race against time, and uncover hidden secrets in this nostalgic point-and-click indie game.

games.name: Liberation Mutagenix
games.short_description: Guide your comrades to freedom in this gravity-bending sci-fi puzzle game. Modify their genetic code, direct their movements, and provide them with the tools they need to escape.

games.name: Void or Hollow
games.short_description: You woke up in a cell in the basement. What now?

games.name: Night of the Living Skurre
games.short_description: A 3D, third person action-platformer. Explore and set up various pranks. Hide and avoid detection, get chased under the couch, watch and laugh as people trip down the stairs, throw pinecones to annoy someone until they snap in this comedic game about a squirrel protecting their home!

games.name: Trail of Destruction
games.short_description: You fly a ship that leaves behind a trail. If you complete a circle, enemies within will be destroyed. Exciting abilities and a dynamic arena with events and items make this difficult task more feasible.

games.name: Witch of the Woods
games.short_description: In Witch of the Woods, you play as a witch who must gather ingredients in the forest in order to cast custom spells on the flora and fauna. Can you maintain the forest's ecosystem while fending off the corruption that is plaguing your woods?

games.name: Circular
games.short_description: Circular is an arcade scoring game.

games.name: The Anomalous Hour
games.short_description: You are alone in a deserted station. Or are you? Take pictures of strange anomalies around the station and you might find a way out.

games.name: Stardew Valley
games.short_description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

games.name: Ducks in Space
games.short_description: Ducks in Space is a 2D platformer where you play as Captain Quackers, a duck attempting to thwart the plans of the most evil creatures in the universe: geese!

games.name: Terraria
games.short_description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

games.name: Starbound
games.short_description: You’ve fled your home, only to find yourself lost in space with a damaged ship. Your only option is to beam down to the planet below, repair your ship and set off to explore the universe...

games.name: Undertale
games.short_description: UNDERTALE! The RPG game where you don't have to destroy anyone.

games.name: Cuphead
games.short_description: Cuphead is a classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Inspired by cartoons of the 1930s, the visuals and audio are painstakingly created with the same techniques of the era, i.e. traditional hand drawn cel animation, watercolor backgrounds, and original jazz recordings.

games.name: Playing History 2 - Slave Trade
games.short_description: Travel back in time and witness the horrors of slave trade firsthand. You will be working as young slave steward on a ship crossing the Atlantic. You are to serve the captain and be his eyes and ears. What do you do, when you realize that your own sister has been captured by the slave traders?

games.name: Dead Cells
games.short_description: Dead Cells is a roguelite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers in 2D souls-lite combat. No checkpoints. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

games.name: Oozi: Earth Adventure
games.short_description: Oozi: Earth Adventure is a classic 2D platformer with old school gameplay - no puzzles, no punishment, just 100% pure classic platforming fun! Its most prominent features are HD visuals and beautiful hand-drawn art, but despite its visual style, it’s a good fit for all kinds of gamers!

games.name: The Sad Story of Emmeline Burns
games.short_description: A short lesbian / yuri visual novel set in England. Our heroine, Toma Andrews, meets a ghost girl wearing an old-fashioned nightgown in a graveyard who calls herself Emmeline. Just who is she, and how did she die?

games.name: Love Rhythm
games.short_description: Behind the hustle and bustle of Seoul City lies many unqiue stories. It’s revolving love, ambition and even hatred and crime.

games.name: Hellworld!
games.short_description: A story-driven 2D platforming game in which you possess your enemies and use their abilities to solve puzzles and make your way through the land of Hellworld.

games.name: Lionessy Story
games.short_description: «Lionessy story» is a visual novel that tells a story of a lion cub living out his carefree days in a lion pride reigning over the great African savannah. But life in the wilderness is never easy, and after a terrible tragedy yanks him out of his pampered lifestyle, the young cub has to face the dangers of the real world where anything...

games.name: GwenBlade: Halloween
games.short_description: MAKE DEMONS LOSE THEIR S#^T in Roguelike Horror Action when you combo them in quick succession! SLAY while investigating dreamworld kidnapping right before HALLOWEEN and most importantly - STAY STYLISH

games.name: City Noodle Shop Simulator
games.short_description: This is a strategy simulation game for Chinese noodle restaurant management. You will be responsible for formulating reasonable cost control and other strategies for the shop, ultimately enabling it to achieve profitability and defeat competitors

games.name: The Roy Game
games.short_description: A game where puking zombies try to puke over your trashcans, you have to defend your trashcans by placing automatic puking robots. Meanwhile you have to attack the zombie-printing machines.

games.name: Kumoon : Ballistic Physics Puzzle
games.short_description: A unique puzzle game : a nonviolent trickshooting challenge with gamepad VR option.

games.name: "Glow Ball" - The billiard puzzle game
games.short_description: Physics based puzzle game type of billiards. If you like billiard games or love pool then this game is for you!

games.name: Crowkart
games.short_description: Race across the cursed world of Crowsworn in this fast-paced kart racing game. Lay waste to your opponents online using a wide array of items, both deadly and comical, as you speed your way through all the racing tracks Fearanndal has to offer!

games.name: Excommunicated
games.short_description: A typing game of investigation in a space base

games.name: Artifact Adventure
games.short_description: The horribly toxic Swamp King has risen once again! Gather your party and set out on an open world, retro-styled, RPG adventure. Powerful mystical artifacts are scattered about the world, each able to grant you new powers. Which will you choose? What is your destiny?

games.name: Exitus
games.short_description: You woke up, and you have no idea where you are. What a coincidence, you don't remember anything at all; could you have been kidnapped? There is only one way to find out.

games.name: Puzzle Dimension
games.short_description: Find solutions to 100 unique puzzles and experience the satisfaction of "Aha" moments!

games.name: The Aloha Bakery
games.short_description: The Aloha Bakery is a comedic romantic visual novel based in Hawaii. It follows the fall from grace of Simon, a 2 Michelin star chef and his redemption when he is invited to visit his friend in Hawaii.

games.name: Little Chefs: CO-OP
games.short_description: Call up your friends and dive into the world of culinary madness where you get to be Little Chefs! Cook dishes, customize and improve your kitchen with the building system, upgrade your character, complete missions and remember: nothing without teamwork, speed and a pinch of madness!

games.name: 伊利斯之梦Ellixir's Dream
games.short_description: Ellixir's Dream is a single-player otome adventure where players, as an alchemist’s daughter, uncover their origins through choices and shape their fate with multiple endings.

games.name: Twin Roads
games.short_description: Our hero Finn got lost in a dream world, guide him and his friends to freedom! Enjoy a calm but a challenging adventure that will defy your mind.

games.name: The Westport Independent
games.short_description: The Westport Independent is a censorship simulator taking place in a post-war country, governed by the recently elected Loyalist Party. As the editor of one of the last independent newspapers in the country, your job is to remove and edit the content of your paper, affecting the people’s opinion of both the rebels and the Loyalist...

games.name: Utopia Colony
games.short_description: The year is 2033. You, an ex-Marine with little opportunities left, have signed up with Utopia Arura, a large mining corporation on Mars. They have sent you to a location they have proposed but you have chosen for mining. Everything else is up to you.

games.name: New kind of adventure
games.short_description: New kind of adventure is a 3D adventure game with RPG elements. Mary hides in a wardrobe after her parents had a fight. She falls asleep. When Mary awakes, she discovers that she is in a beautiful, magical world with giant strawberries and magical druids!With her new friend Aquarius, Mary must find a way back to the real world!

games.name: Puzzle Galaxies
games.short_description: Puzzle Galaxies is a groundbreaking puzzle video game similar to games like Bejeweled and Candy Crush. You must match jewels stored in a space station in a manner similar to Bejeweled, but there's a twist - there are enemies that will come by and try to take matching jewels on you!

games.name: Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures
games.short_description: "The most rewarding game of 2013!" Influenced by retro classics Mega Man and Castlevania, Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures features the AVGN and friends as they blast their way through 10 levels of fun, fast paced 2D action based on the AVGN's adventures in his online series.

games.name: Pixel Puzzles Mosaics
games.short_description: Pixel Puzzles Mosaics is a nontraditional puzzle game.

games.name: Pixel Starships
games.short_description: Pixel Starships is an FTL-style online sci-fi strategy builder and management game with a competitive PVP tournament. Set in the retro galaxy, your role is to explore space, meet aliens, and develop your ship, crew and AI. The game contains deep strategic and 4x elements. PSS is community-driven.

games.name: Survival Zombies The Inverted Evolution
games.short_description: Survival Zombies is a bloody chaotic survival first person shooter that pits heavily armed players against humanity's greatest fear - hordes of undead.

games.name: Indie Game Battle
games.short_description: Indie Game Battle is a multiplayer fighting game for up to 8 players inspired by the Super Smash Bros series. However, IGB features indie characters instead!

games.name: 卷壹:梦行记Volume 1 Dreamwalker's Diary
games.short_description: 《卷壹:梦行记》是一款2D国风单人横版动作游戏，玩家可以使用5种不同的武器进行战斗和探索，还可以使用"随机攻击"来切换不同的攻击方式。游戏中的怪物设计也都采用了国风设计，包括一些大家耳熟能详的神话怪物。(不要买！不要买！不要买！除非你先看过介绍。)

games.name: Valdis Story: Abyssal City
games.short_description: Assume the role of Wyatt in this Action/Exploration Platformer as you explore the ruins of a holy city that was lost many years ago. Battle various types of demons, angels, and a new threat known only as the “Ferals”, using swordsmanship, martial arts, and sorcery.

games.name: Misty Abyss
games.short_description: An elf who lost his memory, holding a broken magic sword, in the foggy forest, met strange orcs. What is the fate of the elf?

games.name: Playing History: Vikings
games.short_description: Playing History'Vikings' is the newest chapter of the Playing History educational game series. The previous two titles in the 'Playing History-Series' have been rewarded with several awards. With 'Playing History: Vikings' we have kicked up the experience several notches by providing a fully realized 3D world to interact with, a deeper...

games.name: Fatty Maze's Adventures
games.short_description: Mr. Fatty Maze’s Adventures is a logic game based on a thrilling story that offers an entirely new outlook on the world of labyrinths!

games.name: A Pixel Story
games.short_description: A Pixel Story is a devious 2D puzzle platformer that charts the evolution of video games. You must use your Magical Teleportation Hat to explore 6 increasingly detailed zones on your quest to reach the core of The System to stop the evil OS and save the world.

games.name: Arcanos One
games.short_description: Arcanos One is an ability-based online 5v5 multiplayer racing game.

games.name: 回门 Way Back Home
games.short_description: "Way back home" is a 2D horizontal board horror puzzle game. It takes the Republic of China period from 1905 to 1926 as the background of the times. With a large number of exquisite original paintings, rich playing methods, excellent music and dubbing, delicate script and narrative game style, it creates a strong historical...

games.name: Robot Exploration Squad
games.short_description: A 2D Metroidvania game with equal focus on action and exploration. Are you a bad enough robot to make it out in one piece?

games.name: Home Improvisation: Furniture Sandbox
games.short_description: Build beautifully precise or wildly creative furniture! Decorate an entire house with your creations. 4 players can play locally, or invite an online player to help you build! Full support for the HTC Vive, including local and online multiplayer

games.name: Vacation Paradise: France Collector's Edition
games.short_description: Let's take a vacation across stunning France, with fun trivia.

games.name: Mystery Coin
games.short_description: Want to try to collect all the coins? Then your time has come. Mystery Coin looks like a simple game, but in reality it is not.

games.name: PixelJunk™ Nom Nom Galaxy
games.short_description: Welcome to SoupCo, Astroworker! In Nom Nom Galaxy, construct and automate gigantic soup factories on unexplored planets throughout the universe, harvest flora and fauna to turn them into artisanal soups, and rocket your product into the gullets of the galaxy!

games.name: Aquarius
games.short_description: Aquarius is a 90's style arcade game where you play as a cave diver in search for treasure, guarded by the ocean's fiercest predators and its cuddliest minnows. Navigate through the caves, collect the treasure, and survive!

games.name: Cosmo's Quickstop
games.short_description: Cosmo’s Quickstop simulates the fast-paced thrill of managing a gas station… IN SPACE! Upgrade your services, please alien customers, and complete your daily chores through simple minigames that add up to a hilariously frantic experience with solo or couch co-op play.

games.name: Wheels of Aurelia
games.short_description: A narrative road trip game set in the roaring Italian 70s, it tells the story of Lella, a restless woman driving on the roads of the western coast of Italy, the famous “Via Aurelia”.

games.name: Mr Meal
games.short_description: You are newly employed agent and you work for an Agency investigating the mysterious Mr Meal. The first day you appeared in your office and right away you got your first mission: find out what is behind all Mr Meal's activities.

games.name: Monster Puzzle
games.short_description: Far away, lost in another dimension, there‘s a world where human dreams come to life. A land built upon sweet dreams where Trekkie and her friends live, safe from the bitter monsters inhabiting the dark world of nightmares.

games.name: Forsaken Lands
games.short_description: Lead a team of brave heroes in a card battle to save the world! You will face dangers at every turn, countless enemies, mysterious relics, and unexpected allies. Overcome challenges using both brute strength and the power of persuasion!

games.name: Trivia Vault: Technology Trivia Deluxe
games.short_description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Technology Trivia Deluxe and bring your thinking hat. Answer video game trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

games.name: InsanZ - Retro Survival Horror
games.short_description: InsanZ is a retro-survival-horror-game of the latest generation. Discover the crazy world of InsanZ, face the nasty creatures from hell and survive to bring back balance to the world. Fight with over 13 different weapons against hordes of monsters, explore the dire world of InsanZ, discover old paths and hidden secrets, use the terrain...

games.name: BATTLE PIXELS
games.short_description: Battle Pixels is a frantic arcade action, point and click shoot 'em up with a 16 bit retro style.Take control of your tanks and eliminate the enemy's turret defences over 25 randomly generated levels.
